notes: On 29 July 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, between 10 to 12 armed individuals kidnapped five workers of money exchange houses. They were found on 30 April by the authorities alive with their hands tied up and blindfolded in Tlajomulco. They were rescued.

On 31 July 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, unknown armed individuals kidnapped the father of the current substitute for the elected senator for Morena and then asked for ransom from the family. On 1 August, the man was released after an activist requested support from the Gulf Cartel and the CJNG for the release of the man.

On 28 July 2024, in Caborca, Sonora, according to witnesses, two armed individuals shot at the military forces in fraccionamiento Fovissste and an armed clash started. One armed man was killed and another one was injured and arrested. 1 fatality.

On 30 July 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, three armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers who repelled the aggression after a homicide was committed close to the penitentiary center La Mesa. The individuals crashed and one man died and the other two were arrested. 1 fatality.

location: Sultepec de Pedro Ascencio de Alquisiras
notes: On 31 July 2024, close to Sultepec de Pedro Ascencio de Alquisiras, Mexico, one armed individual opened fire at state police and military officers while they were on patrol on Almoloya de Alquisiras-Plan de Vigas highway. The officers arrested the man. There were no injuries.

On 29 July 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, armed individuals travelling in a vehicle and a motorcycle shot and killed a state police officer in the south part of the city in Glorieta Juan Pablo II. 1 fatality.
On 30 July 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan, armed individuals clashed in colonia El Porvenir. There were no casualties.

Around 29 July 2024 (week of), in La Magdalena, Guerrero, according to residents, armed men clashed and attacked the community using drones charged with explosives. This event is related to a series of increase of violence in the community. Casualties unknown.
On 28 July 2024, in Teapa, Tabasco, a young drug dealer was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in fraccionamiento Bosque de la Sierra. 1 fatality.
On 28 July 2024, in General Zuazua, Nuevo Leon, members of an unidentified gang clashed with municipal police officers in colonia Real de Palmas. There were no casualties.
On 2 August 2024, in Tapeixtles, Colima, unknown armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers from a moving vehicle on the free highway (drive-by). There were no injuries.

source: El Siglo de Durango; La Jornada; Milenio
notes: On 28 July 2024, in Salinas de Hidalgo, San Luis Potosi, members of an unidentified criminal group ambushed state police officers, national guards, and military officers who were patrolling the community of San Pablo. The officers repelled the attack and three of the perpetrators died. A vehicle and weapons were seized. 3 fatalities.
On 30 July 2024, in Acteal, Chiapas, according to residents of the area, members of Los Herrera Gang were shooting towards the community. Casualties unknown.

source: Hoy Tamaulipas; La Jornada; La Silla Rota
notes: On 30 July 2024, in Heroica Matamoros, Tamaulipas, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed the president of the National Chamber of Commerce when he was going out from his office in Colonia Buenavista. The victim was also a former PRD candidate for governor in 2010. He had recently warned about the security situation in Tamaulipas denouncing that is under the control of criminal gangs and the widespread practice of the collection of floor fees after the convenience store OXXO was shut down in the state due to threats by criminal members. 1 fatality.

source: 8 Columnas; La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio; Riodoce; Zona Franca
notes: On 28 July 2024, near San Rafael, Nuevo Leon, several armed individuals abducted and killed the police chief who was also the Secretary of Public Security of Abasolo while he was with his wife. Later that same day, his body was found with signs of violence near La Hediondilla community. The victim had already received threats and attacks recently. 1 fatality.

Around 1 August 2024 (as reported), in Cancun, Quintana Roo, four people were killed and their bodies were found on the federal highway at the height of Xochimilco park. One of the bodies was identified as a municipal police officer (likely off-duty). 4 fatalities.

On 28 July 2024, around Neutla, Guanajuato, a state police officer (likely off-duty) was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals when he was driving around Neutla. A woman that was driving with him was also injured. 1 fatality.

On 1 August 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, at least four armed individuals intercepted a man and placed handcuffs on him to kidnap him in Colonia Insurgentes. The victim escaped and was shot but not injured. Police officers found the victim.

On 1 August 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and injured a man in Colonia Balcones de Santa Maria in a shopping mal. The perpetrators fled the scene on foot. 1 injury.

On 30 July 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, three armed individuals shot and killed a man was who recently released from prison close to the penitentiary center La Mesa. Police arrived at the scene and engaged in a confrontation (coded separately). 1 fatality.

notes: Around 1 August 2024 (as reported), in Hueyapan de Ocampo, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a couple was killed and the bodies were found with signs of torture on the side of a road that leads to Norma. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 July 2024 (as reported), in Santa Maria Coronango, Puebla, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of violence with her hands and feet tied up in fraccionamiento Villa San Angel. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 30 July 2024 (as reported), in Santiago Tulantepec de Lugo Guerrero, Hidalgo, three women were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and with their hands tied inside a house in Colonia San Isidro. admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 28 July 2024, in Venustiano Carranza (Pena Blanca), Veracruz, two armed individuals on a motorcycle shot at a woman who is the sole councillor (sindica) and treasurer of the municipality. notes: On 28 July 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, armed individuals who arrived on a water motorcycle shot at some individuals in Bulevard Kukulkan. A minor who was a passer-by was shot and killed. The event is related to a drug dealing dispute. 1 fatality.

Around 28 July 2024 (as reported), in Comalcalco, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found inside a house in rancheria Reyes Hernandez with a threatening message and where several drugs were seized. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 30 July 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, two women were killed and their bodies were found in San Miguel Topilejo with signs of violence, bullet wounds, and burns to their bodies. According to a witness, someone arrived in a vehicle and dumped the bodies. The victims were from Venezuela. According to local sources, the perpetrators was the El Tren de Aragua Gang which is dedicated to human trafficking. 2 fatalities.

On 5 August 2024, in Acambay, Mexico, armed individuals kidnapped the public security Commissioner of Temascalcingo and his bodyguard while they were driving in a patrol car. The attack is being linked to La Familia Michoacana. The whereabouts of the victims is unknown.

The victim manage to escape, however, he was shot and injured. 1 injured.

notes: On 2 August 2024, near La Esperanza, Chiapas, members of Los Herrera gang tortured and killed a man suspected to be a member of El Machete self-defense group. A video was published on social networks showing how the perpetrators cut the neck and a hand and removed a kidney from the half-naked victim when he was already dead. According to local residents, the event occurred on 2 August. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 3 August 2024 (between 2 - 3 August), in the municipality of Abasolo, Tamaulipas, there was an armed clash between members of Los Zeta Vieja Escuela Gang and Military Forces supported by State Police Officers, Investigation Police officers, and National Guards members on the Jimenez-Abasolo road. It is suspected that the gang members were the same ones who had attacked during the night of 2 August a hotel in Jimenez where state police were staying (coded separately). Two military officers and five gang members were killed. Also, an unknown number of armed individuals were arrested, and weapons, bulletproof vests, and ammunition were seized. Some sources state that the clash ended in the early morning of the 3rd and that there was a first clash on the road and a second clash in the city of Abasolo. The perpetrators were members of Los Zeta Vieja Escuela Gang (ZVE), and it is suspected that the attack was an act of retaliation for the arrest of the mother and wife of the ZVE's Pantera hitmen leader. 7 fatalities.

source: El Blog del Narco; El Norte; El Proceso; Infobae; La Jornada; La Silla Rota
notes: On 2 August 2024, in Santander Jimenez, Tamaulipas, at night, a group of armed individuals attacked a hotel where members of the State Police were staying. The officers responded to the attack. One police officer was killed, and another was injured. The perpetrators were members of Los Zeta Vieja Escuela Gang (ZVE), and it is suspected that the attack was an act of retaliation for the arrest of the mother and wife of the ZVE's Pantera hitmen leader. The suspected perpetrators then clashed with military and police forces on the Jimenez-Abasolo road (coded separately). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 8 August 2024, in Mexicali, Baja California, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed three brothers who were inside a parked vehicle in fraccionamiento Villas del Rey (drive-by). The attack occurred in a house that is known to be a drug sealing point of the Sinaloa Cartel. 3 fatalities.

Around 4 August 2024 (as reported), in Galeana, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and he was found decapitated with a message on the side of the highway 57 with the head next to the body. The victim was identified as a state police officer. 1 fatality.

source: La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 7 August 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, there was an armed clash between military officers and armed individuals after they tried to stop the arrest of a criminal leader. The armed individuals also set six (narco) roadblocks in the city, including the Reynosa- San Fernando road around the place known as Antigua Aduana, also around Parque Eolico 'El Cortijo', colonia Rincon de las Flores and Las Piramides. One armed man was killed during the confrontation. Two men were arrested later. 1 fatality.

notes: On 12 August 2024, near Berriozabal, Chiapas, members of criminal groups clashed at least three points on the road between Tuxtla Gutierrez and Ocozocuautla. At least two people were killed and that the criminal members took the bodies. Five armored trucks were damaged and weapons and tactical equipment were abandoned. At least 2 fatalities.

notes: Around 11 August 2024 (as reported), in Cuautepec de Hinojosa, Hidalgo, a woman who was a municipal police officer (likely off-duty) was killed and her body was found with gunshot wounds inside a vehicle outside her house in Colonia Chapultepec. 1 fatality.

notes: On 10 August 2024, in Ziquitaro, Michoacan, several armed men entered a house and killed five women. The perpetrators tied up their feet and hands. A two year old boy was also injured. On 19 August 2024, in Chicomuselo, Chiapas, unknown armed individuals attacked the 101 Infantry Batallion with drones loaded with explosives. The officers answered the attack. There were no injuries.

On 17 August 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Mexico, three armed men opened fire at municipal police officers in Colonia Pedregal de Topo Chico during a patrol and repelled the aggression. One police officer was injured as a result and the men crashed their car and fled the scene. Hours later, the three men were arrested. 1 injury.
On 18 August 2024, in Cuauhtemoc, Zacatecas, armed individuals opened fire at the facade of the headquarters of the municipal police in Colonia Esteban Castorena. There were no injuries.

On 18 August 2024, close to Pantelho, Chiapas, unknown armed individuals opened fire at a helicopter of the Citizen protection Secretariat (police forces), the helicopter was hit by a gunshot on a landing strip. The attack happened amid security operations in Pantelho and Chenalho. There were no injuries.

On 20 August 2024, in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between the state police and several armed individuals during a police patrol. Two armed men were killed and another two were arrested. 2 fatalities.
On 21 August 2024, in Chichihualco, Guerrero, there was an armed clash between the state police and military officers against armed individuals during a police patrol. Two armed men were injured.

On 21 August 2024, around Los Villarreales, Nuevo Leon, according to residents, armed individuals travelling in vehicles shot at the state police on the road between Villarreales and Mamulique (drive-by). A police chase ensued and the armed men threw tire puncture devices. Casualties unknown.

On 18 August 2024, in Chicomuselo, Chiapas, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash which led to a (narco) roadblock. One of the groups involved is the self-defense group El Maiz. This is likely related to the ongoing dispute between rival criminal groups.

On 21 August 2024, in Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas, an armed individual shot and injured a judge and president of the Electoral Tribunal of Tamaulipas at his house in Fraccionamiento Valle Dorado. The victim was transferred to a hospital. The judge was recently accused of sexual harassment by employees of the tribunal and he is also involved in an investigation after the results of the municipal election of Nuevo Laredo were contested.
On 17 August 2024, in Chicomuselo, Chiapas, members of two rival groups engaged in an armed clash in Colonia San Caralampio. Casualties unknown.

On 18 August 2024, in Cuauhtemoc, Zacatecas, armed rival groups aboard several vehicles engaged in an armed clash. Two vehicles were shot and one was burned, hundreds of cartridges were found and two people were killed. 2 fatalities.
Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in La Esperanza, Chiapas, two unidentified armed groups clashed. Casualties unknown.

On 19 August 2024, in San Jeronimo Caleras, Puebla, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man after a fight broke out. The victim was identified as a person dedicated to drugs in La Chuchilla and related to a member of a criminal group. 1 fatality.

On 18 August 2024, in Tubutama, Sonora, armed individuals attacked a vehicle transporting migrants and then set fire to it close to the international border with the U.S. One baby was killed and eight migrants were injured. 1 fatality, 8 injuries.
On 16 August 2024, in Huapalcalco, Hidalgo, at least four armed men opened fire from a vehicle (drive-by) at a man when he was leaving his home in a truck. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 16 August 2024 (as reported), in Oriente 1ra seccion, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags on the side of the Reforma-Dos Bocas highway. A message was found next to the body addressed to the head of a criminal group. The victim was a seafood vendor. 1 fatality.
On 16 August 2024, in San Nicolas Galeana de Hidalgo, Morelos, armed men on a motorcycles opened fire and killed a trans woman who was also a LGBTQ+ activist. 1 fatality.
On 17 August 2024, in Teapa, Tabasco, armed individuals traveling in two vehicles chased a couple on their motorcycle and shot them dead (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

Around 17 August 2024 (as reported), in the municipality of Teapa, Tabasco, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and the 'tiro de gracia' in Jose Maria Morelos at KM 32 Villahermosa-Teapa highway. Both victims were naked and tied. 2 fatalities.
On 17 August 2024, in Tultepec, Mexico, unknown armed individuals opened fire and killed the elected councilor and member of the MC inside his business in La Cantera. 1 fatality.

Around 18 August 2024 (between 17 - 18 August), in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags and tied in Colonia Praderas de San Juan. A message was found next to the body. The man was reported missing on 17 August. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Contra Poder en Chiapas; El Norte; Milenio
notes: On 18 August 2024, in Jaltenango, Chiapas, there was a shooting in the community by criminal members, though it is unclear if civilians were directly targeted. According to residents, a (narco) roadblock was set. This event is part of recent clashes between rival criminal groups as well as other violent event in the state involving criminal groups (coded separately).
On 19 August 2024, in Bosque de Saloya, Tabasco, armed individuals in several vehicles chased two men and shot (drive-by) and killed both. 2 fatalities.
Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in El Salto, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied up and signs of violence in Fraccionamiento Cima Serena. 1 fatality.
Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his decapitated head was found inside a pickup truck in Colonia Lomas de San Martin. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de San Pablo del Monte
notes: Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de San Pablo del Monte, Tlaxcala, a man was killed and the body was found burned and wrapped in a blanket. 1 fatality.
On 20 August 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed men on a motorcycle shot at a tortilla shop in a drive-by in Colonia Carolina. A woman was injured.
Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), in El Porvenir (Guadalupe), Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a vehicle. 1 fatality.
Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and only the head was found with a message over the trunk of a car in Colonia Lomas de San Martin. 1 fatality.

Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and only the head was found inside a barrel in fraccionamiento Canadas del Florido and Colonia Las Fuentes. A message was also found were the victim was accuse to be a traitor. 1 fatality.
Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found with the hands tied up, wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia 20 de Noviembre. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de San Pablo del Monte
notes: Around 21 August 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de San Pablo del Monte, Tlaxcala, three men were killed and their bodies were found in Barrio San Nicolas. One of the bodies was beheaded. 3 fatalities.

Around 21 August 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a person was killed and the body was found burned and wrapped in a tarp and beheaded between Colonias Vilas del Trigo and Mision del Real. The head was found inside a suitcase. 1 fatality.

On 21 August 2024, in Ciudad Victoria, Tamaulipas, an armed individual got off a vehicle and shot a former federal deputy and former mayor of Padilla from the PAN party at his house in Colonia Infonavit Jardin, injuring three: the former politician, another man who was with him, and a kid who was nearby. There were no fatalities.
Around 21 August 2024 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and gagged in Colonia Lomas del Aguila. 1 fatality.

Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found executed with the 'tiro de gracia' on a path between Andromeda and Gaseoducto, in front of Colonias Prados de Santa Rosa and Valle de los Nogales. 1 fatality.
On 22 August 2024, in Comalcalco, Tabasco, two armed individuals shot from a motorbike and killed a man who was driving a motorcycle cab (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in Guadalupe municipality, Zacatecas, a person was killed and his/her body was found dismembered on the road leading to Sauceda de la Borda. 1 fatality.
Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in Leona Vicario, Quintana Roo, two men were killed and their heads were found on 307 federal road. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in Zumpango de Ocampo, Mexico, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at a taxi close to Los Sauces housing area and killed the substitute major of Zumpango from the PRD, who was in the taxi (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 23 August 2024 (as reported), in Santa Maria Xonacatepec, Puebla, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found in the municipal Auxiliar Council on Miguel Hidalgo and Miguel Aleman streets. 1 fatality.

On 19 August 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, an armed individual barricaded himself into the Attorney General's Office (ministerial police forces) and opened fire at police officers who repelled the aggression. The victim was injured and arrested for the possession of drugs. 1 injury.

On 20 August 2024, in Santiago Tangamandapio, Michoacan, seven members of the Policia Comunitaria in Las Canteras were abducted by members of a criminal group. The authorities located them alive and with their hands tied on 23 August 2024, close to the Zamora-Ecuandureo road.

source: AFN - Tijuana; El Blog del Narco
notes: On 19 August 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, three armed men traveling in two vehicles caught up with individuals traveling in a vehicle and opened fire (drive-by) on Sanchez Taboada avenue. Three people were injured. One version is that the victims are related to narco business with money laundering. Another version is that two of the victims were identified as bodyguards protecting a woman in the vehicle. Three men were arrested. 3 injuries.
On 23 August 2024, on a road leading to La Chiquita, Campeche, two criminal groups clashed, resulting in the death of a man. 1 fatality.

Around 5 August 2024 (between 3 August - 5 August), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two men were kidnapped by several armed individuals on 3 August on Avenida Tecnologico. A man was killed and his body was found tied and with signs of injuries inside a house. Both victims were beaten up. A second man escaped the house and sought help and were found on 5 August. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Hermosillo, Sonora, four armed individuals entered a house in Colonia Corceles and kidnapped a man. Also, according to witnesses another man was kidnapped by armed individuals in Colonia Quinta Emilia. The whereabouts of the victims are unknown.
On 30 August 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, an armed man clashed with police officer in colonia La Gloria. The man was injured and tactic clothes were seized by the officers.
On 30 August 2024, in San Carlos, Nuevo Leon, armed men clashed with state police officer on the Vallecillo - Palo Alto road. Three officers were injured.
Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with burned in colonia Bella Vista. 1 fatality.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Juarez municipality (coded to Ciudad Juarez), Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of having been executed with a tiro de gracia at the 32 kilometer of the road to Juarez. 1 fatality.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, armed suspects shot and killed a boy in colonia Felipe Angeles. According to witnesses, the attack happened in an area known for being a drug selling point. 1 fatality.
On 30 August 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man on the Vicente Guerrero avenue (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Temimilcingo, Morelos, five people, including a woman, were executed with gunshots by armed men. The perpetrators recorded the execution and posted the video in social medias forcing the victims to said that they were members of a criminal group. 5 fatalities.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, armed men shot and killed and man and injured another one inside a house known for being a drug selling point in colonia Joyas del Carrizal. 1 fatality.
On 30 August 2024, in General Zuazua, Nuevo Leon, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man in the road that connects to Laredo (drive-by). 1 fatality.
On 30 August 2024, in Oaxaca de Juarez, Oaxaca, armed men shot and killed a leader of a transport drivers' union on the road to Etla. 1 fatality.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Sanctorum, Puebla, an unknown number of people were killed and their remains were found inside six packages that were left with a threatening message in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. Unspecified number of fatalities, coded as 3.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Providencia, Veracruz, a man was killed and his handcuffed body was found on the Cordoba - Omealca road. 1 fatality.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan
notes: On 29 August 2024, near Pancha Lopez, Michoacan, members of the CJNG clashed with National Guard, state police and ministerial police forces on the Pancha Lopez-Felipe Angeles road. Three gang members were killed. The victims were wearing tactical equipment with the acronyms CJNG and FEM (Fuerzas Especiales Mencho). Five weapons were seized. 3 fatalities.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio
notes: On 29 August 2024, in the municipality of Tepalcatepec, Michoacan, there were armed clashes between gangs near the border with Jalisco on the border between Buenavista and Punta de Agua. During the clashes, criminal groups attacked at least six villages, including Cholula, Punta Agua and El Pujido along the Tepalcatepec - Jilotlan highway, leaving several people injured. According to residents, the clashes were between the CJNG and the Abuelo gang over the control of territory. Some reports suggest that Los Viagras gang was also involved in the clash after announcing their alliance with the CJNG. The gangs used drones and carried out (narco) roadblocks on the Apatzingan-Tepalcatepec road.

On 29 August 2024, in Ejido Penasco, Sinaloa, unidentified suspects attacked a state police officers and injured him. This happened amid clashes between security forces and the Sinaloa Cartel in other areas of Culiacan municipality (coded separately).

On 29 August 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, an unknown number of armed individuals shot at State Police officers on Libramiento Sur II, killing one police officer and injuring another. The police officers were attacked when they were changing a tire on their patrol car after getting a flat tire due to the presence of tire punctures on the road. 1 fatality, 1 injured.
Around 29 August 2024 (as reported), in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket in colonia Plan Libertador. 1 fatality.
Around 29 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and legs tied and wrapped in a blanket in colonia Altiplano. 1 fatality.
On 29 August 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Tlalpan, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a couple in colonia Bosques de Tepeximilpa (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

On 29 August 2024, in Coyuca de Benitez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, armed individuals carried out a shooting on the Zihuatanejo - Acapulco federal highway. A Federal Electricity Commission worker who was in the area was shot and killed. The motive and the main target of the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2024, in La Ruana, Michoacan, criminal groups carried out attacks in the community. This attack is part of the clashes between the Cartel del Abuelo and the alliance of the CJNG and Los Viagras in areas near Buenavista and Tepacaltepec. Casualties unknown.

On 29 August 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man outside a tortilla stall in Colonia Trinidad. The place where the attack happened is known for being a drug selling point. 1 fatality.
On 29 August 2024, in Pesqueria, Nuevo Leon, two armed men enter a barbershop in colonia Cantoral and shot at people, killing a couple and injuring a man. 2 fatalities.
On 29 August 2024, in San Juan Colon, Puebla, during the early morning, three armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man near a sports field. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2024, in Tehuacan, Puebla, a man was shot dead by armed individuals on a motorcycle (drive-by) on 10 Sur street. The victim had a criminal record (not specified) and had recently been released from prison. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2024, in Hermosillo, Sonora, according to witnesses, a woman was shot dead by armed individuals in a house in Colonia Nuevo Sahuaro. Unofficially it was mentioned that the perpetrators were looking for the woman's son, who is suspected to be a drug dealer. 1 fatality.

On 29 August 2024, near Villahermosa, Tabasco, armed men on a motorcycle shot at a couple who was also on a motorcycle on the road that connects Villahermosa to Nacajuca (drive-by). The man died and the woman was injured. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 29 August 2024 (as reported), in Catemaco, Veracruz, a person was killed and the beheaded and handcuffed body was found on the 180 federal road. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 29 August 2024, in Oluta, Veracruz, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man outside an Oxxo store (drive-by). The victim was identified as the singer of a band. 1 fatality.

source: La Silla Rota; La Voz de Michoacan
notes: On 29 August 2024, in Punta del Agua, Michoacan, four officers of the Civil Guard in a vehicle ran over a landmine which exploded leaving the four officers injured. The landmine was likely set by gang members who dispute the area.

On 28 August 2024, in Chicomuselo municipality, Chiapas, armed men attacked a group of people who were blocking the entrance to the Chicomuselo municipality, using drones charged with explosives. There were no casualties.

On 28 August 2024, in Benemerito de las Americas, Chiapas, hours before a private clinic was attacked (coded separately), there was an armed clash at the entrance to the town in which two people were killed. The motive for the clash is unknown. 2 fatalities.
On 28 August 2024, in La Nortena, Chihuahua, armed men clashed with state police officers who were patrolling the area. Two men died. 2 fatalities.

On 28 August 2024, in Benemerito de las Americas, Chiapas, according to witnesses, a group of armed men who arrived in three trucks shot at a clinic for more than 30 minutes. During the attack, teachers, students and parents of students of a kindergarten near the clinic had to take cover to avoid being injured. According to reports, this attack is related to extortions from armed groups that control the area. There were no casualties.

Around 28 August 2024 (month of), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied, wrapped in blankets, and in an advanced state of decomposition on the streets Transformacion and Anthony Quinn. 1 fatality.
On 28 August 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed en shot and killed a man in Colonia Villa Juarez when he was arriving to his house. 1 fatality.
On 28 August 2024, in Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, armed men in a vehicle shot and injured two men in colonia Balcones de Anahuac 2 (drive-by).

On 28 August 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, unidentified armed people shot and killed three people in colonia El Vergel. Two were owners of a business and the third victim could be a worker of client. 3 fatalities.
Around 28 August 2024 (as reported), in Tinajas, Hidalgo, a man was killed and his body was found with sounds of torture, without his corneas, and with a gunshot to the head. 1 fatality.

Around 28 August 2024 (as reported), in Tlajomulco de Zuniga, Jalisco, during the early morning hours, three people argued with a man (unknown over what) and shot him dead at a house in Fraccionamiento Chulavista. The victim's body was found in the morning. The motive for the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.

On 28 August 2024, in Xoxocotla, Morelos, the candidate for mayor of Xoxocotla and leader of the Francisco Villa Popular Front was shot and killed by armed men on motorcycles while driving his truck on the Jojutla-Alpuyeca highway. The electoral process in this municipality is governed by customs and traditions as an indigenous community, so the elections will be held next October. According to residents, the victim was denied registration to run because they claimed that although he was born in this municipality, he presented a birth certificate from Jojutla. 1 fatality.
Around 28 August 2024 (as reported), in Cancun, Quintana Roo, a person was killed and the body was found inside a bag in Colonia El Sheriff in the 236 region. 1 fatality.
Around 28 August 2024 (as reported), in the municipality of Tlaltenango de Sanchez Roman, Zacatecas, a man was killed and his body was found hanging from a bridge. 1 fatality.
On 27 August 2024, in La Mesilla, Chiapas, armed rival groups engaged in a clash. Casualties unknown.

source: Diario Contra Poder en Chiapas; La Jornada
notes: Around 27 August 2024 (as reported), in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, armed men shot and killed a military officer who was driving a vehicle on the Tuxtla Gutierrez - Ocozocoautla road. 1 fatality.

source: Diario Via Libre; La Silla Rota; News Hidalgo
notes: On 27 August 2024, in Tulancingo, Hidalgo, several armed individuals arrived in three vehicles and entered a house in colonia Francisco I Madero and kidnapped five people. While they were escaping, unidentified armed men shot at them and engaged in a clash and a car chase. Police officers arrived and participated in the chase, shooting at the armed men. Two men were killed and three others were injured and arrested. 2 fatalities.
On 27 August 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, armed men clashed in colonia Venta del Astillero. One man was found injured and handcuffed in the back seat of a taxi.

On 27 August 2024, in El Limon de la Luna, Michoacan de Ocampo, the Los Viagras gang and their allies the CJNG were intercepted by military officers on their way to the municipal capital, leading to an armed clash. The clash lasted three hours and forced residents to flee. Casualties unknown.
On 27 August 2024, in La Rastra, Sinaloa, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash. There were no casualties.
Around 27 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia 20 de Noviembre. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, close to San Gregorio Chamic, Chiapas, armed individuals threw homemade explosive devices at a caravan of residents when they were traveling on the federal highway 190. There were no injuries.
Around 27 August 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Deportistas. 1 fatality.
Around 27 August 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic in Colonia Toluquilla. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Ojo de Agua, Mexico, several men who arrived in two vehicles attacked with sticks and guns several public transportation units of the company Servicio Expresso that were at the terminal of line 1 of the Mexibus. Some of the buses had passengers inside. It is suspected that five drivers were injured (two of them by gunshots) and that the attack is related to a dispute between transporters for the control of routes. Some sources stated that 15 vehicles were damaged. 5 injured.

On 27 August 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, two armed men traveling in a vehicle opened fire and shot a man inside his vehicle in Colonia Vistas de Altozano (drive-by). The man was unharmed and was able to escape the scene. There were no casualties.

On 27 August 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, two men on a motorcycle shot a man in his legs in Colonia Los Higaredas (drive-by). The victim was transported to the hospital after the attack. 1 injury.
On 27 August 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, several armed men opened fire at a home and killed two people, including one 14-year-old boy in Colonia Colinas del Sol segundo sector. 2 fatalities.
On 27 August 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, at least two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Valle de Santo Domingo. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Santiago Yaitepec, Oaxaca, armed men shot and killed the former mayor of Yaitepec and his brother when they were both in a vehicle. The former mayor was a representative of the PRI party and was also a teacher member of the CNTE. 2 fatalities.

On 27 August 2024, in Chetumal, Quintana Roo, about 12 hooded and armed individuals beat and threatened an off-duty National Guard police officer in front of his family in his home in Colonia Forjadores. The police officer was assigned to the Chetumal International Airport. The motive for the attack is unknown. 1 injured.

On 27 August 2024, in Tulum, Quintana Roo, at least two armed men started a shooting inside a beach club, killing a worker and injuring another one. Police later arrested three men in connection with this attack. 2 fatalities.

On 27 August 2024, in Querobabi, Sonora, armed men shot and killed a well known farmer in rancho Agua Blanca. The farmer was the brother of the General Secretary of the Regional Livestock Union of Sonora (UGRS). 1 fatality.

On 26 August 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, armed men shot at employees and security guards of two jewellery stores in the city close to the municipal presidency. The stores were attacked simultaneously. Four people were killed, including two security guards and two employees and five people were injured. 4 fatalities, 5 injuries.
On 26 August 2024, in El Limon de la Luna, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Viagras gang and Los Reyes engaged in armed clashes, shootings and drones attacks were reported. Casualties unknown.

On 26 August 2024, in El Caracol, Michoacan de Ocampo (coded to capital Buenavista Tomatlan), Los Viagras gang and Los Reyes engaged in armed clashes. Shootings and drones attacks were reported. Casualties unknown.

Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with their hands tied and with gunshot wounds in Colonia Las Arboledas. 2 fatalities.

Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found inside a vehicle with bullet holes and a cardboard with a message near colonia El Soler. 1 fatality.
Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Champoton, Campeche, a man was killed and his body was found with the skin stripped from his leg. 1 fatality.
On 26 August 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, at least two armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a couple and then fled the scene in Colonia Geovillas de los Sauces. 2 fatalities.
Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Barajillas, Guerrero, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found burned inside a truck on the Los Marin ranch. 2 fatalities.

On 26 August 2024, in Santiago Tulantepec de Lugo Guerrero, Hidalgo, a man attacked an off-duty National Guard officer when he arrived home in Colonia La Joya with a knife. The perpetrator damaged the victim's vehicle and kidnapped his wife and his daughter. The officer was injured and the whereabouts of the other victims remains unknown. 1 injury.

Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Colonia Guadalupana, Jalisco, a man was attacked and kidnapped and his fingers of one of his hands were amputated. The man was found alive and transported to the hospital. 1 injury.

On 26 August 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a 16-year-old boy was killed and his body was found in a vacant lot in fraccionamiento Real de Valencia tied and with gunshot wounds. Two men had abducted and killed him earlier the same day. The perpetrators were arrested. 1 fatality.
On 26 August 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed individuals entered a home and killed a man in Colonia Ricardo Flores Magon. A message was left next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 26 August 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, armed men chased a woman and opened fire from their motorcycle at her in Colonia Paseo de las Palmas (drive-by). The woman died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 26 August 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Mexico, several armed men opened fire at four people killing three people and injuring one inside a home in Colona Santa Marta. 3 fatalities, 1 injury.
Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), in Miguel Hidalgo, Tabasco, one man and one woman were killed and their bodies were found inside their apartment with a message on top of the man. 2 fatalities.
On 26 August 2024, in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, at least two armed men shot two people. One woman died and one man was injured. Police officers arrested two men. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 25 August 2024, in Bejucal de Ocampo, Chiapas, members of the CJNG and the Sinaloa Cartel clashed in the Barrio Reforma area. At least five residents were killed, though other repots suggest that 10 people were killed. At least 700 residents fled the area after the clashes. At least 5 fatalities.
On 25 August 2024, in Benemerito de las Americas, Chiapas, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash in the center. Armed individuals were seen circulating in vehicles. Casualties unknown.

On 25 August 2024, in Canada Morelos municipality, Puebla, National Guard officers and armed individuals clashed, resulting in one dead. Also in Canada Morelos municipality, another clash between National guard and armed men was reported at the km. 001+000 of Cuacnopalan-Oaxaca highway, with unknown casualties. At least 1 fatality.

On 25 August 2024, in Monclova, Coahuila de Zaragoza, suspected gang members threw stones at a man who was driving a motorbike on Ruben Jaramillo street in Colonia Independencia, injuring him. He was later transferred to Amparo Pape de Benavides hospital.

Around 25 August 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, suspectedly at least two people, a man and a woman, were killed and their human remains were found in plastic bags together with a message alluding to an unspecified criminal group on Celaya-Comonfort road, close to the community of Teneria del Santuario. At least 2 fatalities.

On 25 August 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, an armed individual on a motorbike shot at people in the intersection of Reyes Heroles and Isla Zanzibar streets, killing a woman and injuring a man (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 25 August 2024, in Nepopualco, Morelos, according to witnesses, armed individuals wearing tactical clothing shot at people in a food stand known as 'La Parota' or 'El Fogon' on Xochimilco-Oaxtepec road, killing four and injuring one. The perpetrators fled on a van towards Cuatla. 4 fatalities.
On 25 August 2024, in San Francisco Ocotlan, Puebla, a couple of armed individuals exchanged words with a man and a woman and then shot and killed them. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 25 August 2024 (as reported), near Correa, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a woman was killed and her burnt body was found inside a burnt van on a rural path between Sayula de Aleman and Oluta, close to an area known as La Yeguada. The victim was identified as a missing woman. 1 fatality.

Around 24 August 2024 (as reported), in Trigomil, Nayarit, armed individuals on a van shot at National Guard officers who approached the placed, leading to an armed clash. The armed individuals fled. The officers seized 17 grenades, 17 improvised explosive devices and 15 firearms. There were no fatalities or casualties.

Around 24 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California Sur, a man was killed and his body was found with signs and violence and with his arms and legs tied in a house on Tercera street in Colonia Zona Centro. Also in Tijuana, a man was killed and his burnt body was found covered with a plastic bag on Bulevard 2000 in Colonia Altiplano. In a third attack, a man was killed and his burnt body was found tied with wire and wrapped in a blanket on Lopez Leyva street, in Otay Centenario, Colonia Empleado Postal. 3 fatalities.

On 24 August 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed men shot from a motorbike and killed a man in his garden center on Adolfo Lopez Mateos boulevard, close to Glorieta Fundadores (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 24 August 2024 (as reported), in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan, armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officer on Ninos Heroes street in Colonia Jardines de Catedral. 1 fatality.

On 24 August 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals on a car shot and killed a man in the intersection of Ulises and Proteo streets, in the first sector of Colonia Paseo de San Nicolas (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 24 August 2024 (as reported), in Tamulte de las Sabanas, Tabasco, suspected members of Jalisco New Generation Cartel tortured and killed four women and two men suspectedly linked to another criminal group. The perpetrators put the men's bodies into packages. The event was recorded and posted on social media. 4 fatalities.

On 23 August 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, armed individuals entered the offices of a law firm on Alvaro Obregon street in Colonia Alameda, shot and killed a lawyer, injured a woman employee, and set fire to the office. The lawyer was a member of Citizen's Movement party, former representative of the party to the Municipal Electoral Institute in the past elections, and member of the Municipal Transition Committee in the municipality of Cortazar. He was also the lawyer and personal secretary of mayor elect of Cortazar, who had recently denounced threats and persecution by organized crime groups. 1 fatality.

Around 22 August 2024 (as reported), in Frontera Comalapa, Chiapas, armed men abducted around 60 men from Paso Hondo and Bella Vista del Norte communities, and threatened the residents to come back and abduct more men over 18-years-old. This is likely related to the forced recruitment carried out by criminal groups in the state.
On 21 August 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed (drive-by) a man in fraccionamiento Villa Los Arcos. 1 fatality.
On 21 August 2024, in Chicomuselo, Chiapas, armed men launched a grenade from a drone and killed a military officers. 1 fatality.
On 21 August 2024, in Benemerito de las Americas, Chiapas, armed men ambushed military forces who were patrolling the area. There were no casualties.
On 21 August 2024, in El Coire, Michoacan de Ocampo, an armed group and members of an unidentified Policia Comunitaria clashed, resulting in two dead and 25 injured. 2 fatalities.

On 21 August 2024, in Barretal, Tamaulipas, armed individuals shot and killed a man who was working at a water purifier. The victim is the brother of a former federal deputy and former mayor of Padilla from the PAN party that was shot and injured by armed individuals at his house in Ciudad Victoria earlier that day (coded separately). 1 fatality.

source: Diario Contra Poder en Chiapas; El Norte; Milenio
notes: On 20 August 2024, in Frontera Comalapa, Chiapas, there was a shooting in the community by criminal members. According to residents, a (narco) roadblock was set. This event is part of a series of recent armed clashes between rival criminal groups and events in the state related to criminal groups (coded separately).

On 8 August 2024, in San Cayetano, Nayarit, at least two armed individuals who arrived to a local party started shooting at the people. Four people were killed and another three were injured. 4 fatalities, 3 injured.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 8 August 2024, in Acayucan, Veracruz, armed individuals shot at a vehicle parked in front of a restaurant in Barrio Villalta. The vehicle is used by the city hall and by the mayor. The mayor from the PRD party was inside a restaurant with a municipal worker and the owner of the restaurant. The bodyguards of the mayor replied the attack. There were no casualties.
On 28 July 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, according to witnesses, armed individuals aboard a vehicle shot and killed in a drive-by a man in colonia Carrizal. 1 fatality.

source: La Jornada; Pagina 24 Jalisco; Pagina 24 Zacatecas
notes: On 29 August 2024, close to Yahualica de Gonzalez Gallo, Jalisco, members of the CJNG attacked military officers who repelled the aggression between Yahualica de Gonzalez Gallo and Los Altos. One military officer died and four were injured. Four vehicles and weapons were seized. At least ten armed gunmen were killed as a result. 11 fatalities.
Around 31 July 2024 (as reported), in Anacleto Canabal 3ra seccion, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and covered in grey tape. 1 fatality.
Around 30 July 2024 (as reported), in Rincon de Tamayo, Guanajuato, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found naked and hanging from a bridge. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 15 August 2024 (as reported), in El Frijol Colorado, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two people were killed and their bodies were found tied and with signs of violence on a road that connects to Granjas Carroll. 2 fatalities.
Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in Rincon de Tamayo, Guanajuato, two men were killed and their bodies were found hanging from a bridge with signs of violence. 2 fatalities.
On 3 September 2024, in Mexicali, Baja California, according to witnesses, a man was shot and killed by armed men outside the general hospital. 1 fatality.

source: El Blog del Narco; Infobae; La Jornada; Milenio
notes: On 4 September 2024, near San Pablo, Baja California, armed individuals who arrived in two vehicles shot and killed the deputy commander of the Directorate of Citizen Security and Municipal Transit of Tecate on the Tecate-Mexicali free highway. The perpetrators were suspected to be linked to the CJNG. Four people were arrested. The victim had previously been identified on narco-banners signed by the CJNG as one of the agents who provided information to cartels in the area, particularly the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 4 September 2024, in Mexicali, Baja California, armed individuals travelling in two vehicles attacked at the state police during a police patrol around Ejido Oviedo Mota and Carrancita. Two police officers were injured.
Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a woman was killed and her body was found wrapped in a blanket and with signs of strangling in the downtown area. 1 fatality.

On 30 August 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, unknown armed individuals attacked the home of a trans community activist while she was inside and set fire to a piece of furniture. There were no casualties.
Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Empleados Postales. 1 fatality.

Around 3 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, three men were killed and their bodies were found inside the trunk of a car with California plates in fraccionamiento Soler. The victims were strangled. 3 fatalities.

On 3 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was kidnapped in Zona San Fe. The perpetrators shot at the victim and was left injured. The police intervened and rescued the victim. Three people were arrested. 1 injured.
On 4 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, two armed men entered a house and shot and injured a woman in colonia Camino Verde.
On 4 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California, armed men in a vehicle shot and injured three men in a drive-by in colonia Zona Norte. 3 injured.

On 4 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California Sur, according to one of the victims, at least three men entered La Cueva del Peludo bar and shot at people, killing a man and injuring two. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

On 5 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California Sur, according to witnesses, at least three armed men arrived at Roma Pharmacy on Paseo del Campo avenue and Pavo Real street, in fraccionamiento Villas del Campo, suspectedly looking for a man that sought shelter inside. One or two of the armed men (the exact number varies among sources) entered and shot at people who were inside, killing a man and injuring two women: the doctor and an employee. The perpetrators also abducted a man and a woman. Minutes later, on Paseo del Campo street, also in fraccionamiento Vullas del Campo, a man was shot and injured, and suspectedly the man and a woman that had been abducted were shot and killed. 3 fatalities.

On 5 September 2024, in Tijuana, Baja California Sur, according to witnesses, at least three armed individuals shot and killed a man on Isla de Todos los Santos street, in Colonia Camino Verde. The perpetrators fled in a van. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2024, in Tzajalchen, Chiapas, two armed men shot and killed a tsotsil man who was outside a store. According to the source, the perpetrators are from the Tzanembolom community and are linked to Los Herrera gang. 1 fatality.
On 1 September 2024, in Chicomuselo, Chiapas, unknown armed individuals launched drones with explosives against residents. Casualties unknown.

On 5 September 2024, in Frontera Comalapa, Chiapas, members of criminal groups abducted an unspecified number of men and kids, suspectedly as a forced recruitment to conduct criminal activities. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, a man was killed and found inside his car with gunshot wounds to his body at the junction with Ocozocoautla-Las Choapas highway. The man was identified as an off-duty officer of the army. 1 fatality.

On 3 September 2024, in Tuxtla Gutierrez, Chiapas, at least four hooded armed men abducted two men in a coffee shop in Colonia Teran. One of the victims was the elected major of Frontera Comalapa, of the Ecologist Green Party of Mexico (PVEM). The event was recorded by a security camera. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

On 3 September 2024, in San Juanito, Chihuahua, seven men who were pointed out as drug dealers were kidnapped, gagged with duct tape and tied up to poles in the city center. Next to them were left cardboard signs with messages written by the criminal group NCDJ (New Juarez Cartel). The message was a warning for those who dare to sell or consume crystal.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, armed individuals shot from a car and injured a man on Rio Guadiana and Rio San Francisco streets, in Colonia Riberas de Sacramento (drive-by). Before shooting the victim, the perpetrators crashed their vehicle into the victim's motorcycle. 1 injured.

On 5 September 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot from a car and injured a person on Soto Gama and 27a y Media streets, in Colonia Villa Juarez (drive-by). The victim fled and has not been located. 1 injured.
Around 2 September 2024 (month of), in Santa Rita, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found tied with duct tape in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Cinco Llagas, Chihuahua, according to human rights groups, members of criminal groups linked to drug dealing attacked, threatened and displaced residents of the Raramuri indigenous community. This incident was replicated in other localities of the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

On 27 August 2024, in La Trampa, Chihuahua, according to human rights groups, members of criminal groups linked to drug dealing attacked, threatened and displaced residents of the Raramuri indigenous community. This incident was replicated in other localities of the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

On 27 August 2024, in Pie de la Cuesta, Chihuahua, according to human rights groups, members of criminal groups linked to drug dealing attacked, threatened and displaced residents of the Raramuri indigenous community. This incident was replicated in other localities of the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

Around 6 September 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Azcapotzalco, an armed man in a taxi shot at two men on a motorbike in Colonia Manuel Rivera Anaya (drive-by). The victims attempted to flee and the perpetrator initiated a persecution that ended in the intersection between Andres Henestrosa street and De las Culturas avenue. One of the victims died and the other was injured. The perpetrator fled. 1 fatality.
Around 2 September 2024 (as reported), in Tecoman, Colima, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic with a message next to the body. 1 fatality.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), near El Milagro, Durango, three people were killed and their bodies were found with the 'tiro de gracia' on km. 146 of Torreon-Jimenez road. The bodies were in a van close to Monumento Solidaridad. 3 fatalities.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, two armed men shot and killed a man while working in a shop of natural products in front of the hospital of the Mexican Social Security Institute (IMSS). 1 fatality.
On 31 August 2024, in Ojo Seco, Guanajuato, armed men on a motorcycle opened fire from a vehicle and shot a man and a woman selling hamburgers (drive-by). Both were killed as a result. 2 fatalities.

On 4 September 2024, near Comonfort, Guanajuato, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed at the former councilor in the Comonfort City Council (2018-2021) and virtual secretary of the City Council (2024-2027) for the Morena Party when he was travelling on the road to Jalpilla. The victim was also a former trustee in the administration (2015-2018), he was a legal advisor in the administration (2009-2012) and worked at the Federal Electoral Institute and at INEGI. 1 fatality.

Around 31 August 2024 (as reported), in Tixtla de Guerrero, Guerrero, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered and decapitated at the entrance to Barrio del Fortin. A message was found next to the human remains. 1 fatality.
Around 3 September 2024 (as reported), in San Sebastian del Alamo, Jalisco, three people were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic. 3 fatalities.
On 31 August 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, two men shot and injured a man in Colonia Tapatios and fled the scene. 1 injury.
Around 2 September 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Nezahualcoyotl, Mexico, two men were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in blankets in Colonia Benito Juarez. 2 fatalities.

On 6 September 2024, in San Pedro Cholula, Mexico, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at a woman that was driving a van in the neighborhood of Mixquitla (drive-by). The victim was not injured. According to the victim, the perpetrators actually intended to attack her husband, who is the owner of the van. There were no casualties.

On 31 August 2024, in Cenobio Moreno, Michoacan de Ocampo, unknown armed individuals launched drones with explosives against residents killing six people and injuring a man. One house was damaged. 6 fatalities.

On 31 August 2024, in Erendira, Michoacan, two military officers were seriously injured when they tried to deactivate an explosive that was on the Apatzingan-Anguililla highway and exploded. There is no information on who planted the explosive. 2 injured.

On 5 September 2024, in Zirapetiro, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal police officer from Buenavista Tomatlan that was driving a motorbike on Apatzingan-Buenavista road. 1 fatality.

Around 6 September 2024 (as reported), in Tepalcatepec, Michoacan de Ocampo, a landmine suspectedly placed by members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel exploded when a man driving a quad-bike passed-by on the path leading to Taistan, injuring him.

On 6 September 2024, in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty woman municipal police officer that was driving a motorbike on Lazaro Cardenas street, a few meters from the entry to Fraccionamiento Valle Dorado. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, an unknown number of armed individuals shot and injured a lawyer who was driving on Los Cipreses street, in Colonia Puerta del Sol. There is no information on the perpetrators or the motive for the attack. 1 injured.
Around 3 September 2024 (as reported), in Tetecalita, Morelos, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found inside a burned moto taxi. 2 fatalities.
Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in Jiutepec, Morelos, an unknown number of people were attacked and human hands were found in a housing unit La Joya. Casualties unknown.

On 6 September 2024, in Jiutepec, Morelos, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at National Guard officers in front of a high school and fled (drive-by) in Colonia Atlacomulco. An unspecified number of armed individuals were later arrested. Casualties unknown.
On 30 August 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, armed men opened fire from a moving vehicle (drive-by) and killed a man driving his car. 1 fatality.

On 1 September 2024, in Doctor Coss, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire at elements of the military, the state police and the National Guard who repelled the aggression. Four armed individuals were killed and one officer was injured. Officers seized one monster type vehicle. 4 fatalities, 1 injury.
On 5 September 2024, in San Rafael, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals who arrived in at least three vehicles abducted two people. The victims' whereabouts are unknown. There were no fatalities.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed men who arrived on a motorbike shot and injured a man on Hacienda del Sol avenue, Colonia Hacienda del Sol. 1 injured.

On 2 September 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle (drive-by) at four people outside a house in Colonia Cuatro de Octubre. One teenager died and the other three minors were injured. The attack is being linked to the sale of drugs. 1 fatality, 3 injuries.

On 3 September 2024, in Santa Maria Tonameca, Oaxaca, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at another car in a drive-by. A woman was killed and two people were injured after the victim's car crashed. 1 fatality.

On 2 September 2024, in Amozoc de Mota, Puebla, two armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers who repelled the aggression in Colonia El Arenal. One armed individual died and one officer was injured. Another version claims that two men were drinking alcohol and after an argument they shot each other. A police officer went to attend to the report, but was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 2 September 2024, in Chachapa, Puebla, there was an armed clash between the municipal police and armed individuals. Two police officers were injured, including a former director. One armed man was killed. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

Around 31 August 2024 (between 28 August - 2 September), in Azumbilla, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found decapitated and with signs of torture on the side of the federal highway 160 Orizaba-Tehuacanon 31 August. The victim was identified as the former candidate for municipal president of Quecholac and member of the Morena party. The victim was also the uncle of a federal senator of the PRI party. The victim was reported missing on 28 August. 1 fatality.

Around 4 September 2024 (between 3 - 5 September), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found on 5 September in plastic bags on the old path leading to San Jose Miahuatlan. The victim disappeared on 3 September 2024 and is a suspected member of the 'Los Cocoles' criminal group who had a police record for drug dealing. 1 fatality.
Around 3 September 2024 (as reported), between San Gabriel Chilac and San Jose Miahuatlan, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Santiago de Queretaro, Queretaro, bodyguards and armed individuals clashed near Balvanera Industrial Park in Corregidora when the latter attempted to abduct a businessman. The business man and one of the bodyguards were injured. The perpetrators fled. 2 injured.

source: El Blog del Narco; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada
notes: On 3 September 2024, in San Jose del Llano, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between rival armed individuals. At least two men were killed, although it is suspected that there are two other victims whose bodies have not been found. At least 2 fatalities.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), near La Campana, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and a missing finger that had been amputated on km. 32+500 of Mexico 15 road, in a section heading from La Campana to Agua Salada. 1 fatality.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in Lazaro Cardenas, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found in a suitcase on a cargo train that was heading to Mexicali when it stopped at Sufragio station. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), close to Heroica Guaymas, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket on the side of the highway Guaymas-Hermosillo at KM 165. 1 fatality.

Around 1 September 2024 (between 1 - 2 September), in Heroica Nogales, Veracruz, unidentified armed individuals kidnapped a businessman on 1 September. He was beaten up, shot and injured and left alive in Rancho Viejo, where he was found on 2 September. 1 injured.

source: El Sol del Sureste; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 3 September 2024, in Cardenas, Tabasco, a man was beaten and was found semi-naked with signs of torture in Colonia Petrolera. The victim, who was beaten with a wooden board (tableado), had a message hanging on the front door addressed to people involved in the theft of motorcycles. 1 injured.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in Macuspana, Tabasco, a man was killed and his beheaded head was found inside a fridge on the federal road in front of Oasis hotel, with a threatening message written on a cardboard and signed by the CJNG. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; La Jornada; Lider Web
notes: On 30 August 2024, in Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, a man was killed and his body was found inside a car in Colonia Campestre. Five packages containing cocaine were found in the vehicle. The man was identified as the elected trustee of the Morena-PT-PVEM for city council, former delegate of the Attorney General's Office of the State of Tamaulipas in Nuevo Laredo. The victim was kidnapped in June and later released after he was suspected of having been forced to record a video against the mayor and her husband, and to announce his withdrawal from the political campaign (coded separately). A day before the 2 June elections, the victim denounced that the husband of her team's mayoral candidate was colluding with the Gulf Cartel and the Carmona clan. It is being investigated whether the attack is related to these accusations. 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, unidentified armed individuals opened fire and shot an off-duty state police officer with his girlfriend in Colonia Longoria. The man died as a result and the woman was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 1 September 2024, in Reynosa, Tamaulipas, armed individuals opened fire at state police officers in Colonia La Amistad who repelled the aggression. One police officer died as a result and one man was arrested together with the seizure of a vehicle, weapons and other tactical equipment. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in Atoyac, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a person was attacked and a dismembered finger was found in Colonia Progreso. Casualties unknown.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 3 September 2024, in Catemaco, Veracruz, according to witnesses, two armed men entered a bar and shot at two people. One person was killed and another one injured. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 1 September 2024, in Isla, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unknown armed men entered a home and attacked the former PRD candidate for mayor and his wife and son in the downtown area. The bodyguards of the former candidate repelled the aggression. The family was injured as a result. 3 injuries.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota
notes: Around 31 August 2024 (as reported), in Loma Larga, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and the 'tiro de gracia' on the Perote-Jalacingo highway. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 6 September 2024, in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, armed individuals shot and killed a police officer likely off-duty (since he was driving his personal car) on Constitucion street by Guanajuato street. The victim was the chief inspector in charge of the Fresnillo district of the Zacatecas Investigative Police. 1 fatality.

On 31 August 2024, in El Lobo, Zacatecas, armed individual attacked state police officers. The armed individuals also burned two vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock to prevent police from catching them in different locations such as Tierra Blanca. Two armed individuals were arrested. Casualties unknown.

On 31 August 2024, in El Nigromante, Zacatecas, armed individuals engaged in an armed clash with state police officers. The armed individuals also burned two vehicles to set a (narco) roadblock to prevent police from catching them in different locations such as El Obraje, El Sitio, and El Rayo. Casualties unknown.

source: El Siglo de Durango; Pagina 24 Zacatecas
notes: On 31 August 2024, in Ignacio Zaragoza, Zacatecas, unknown armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers on surveillance who repelled the aggression. One police officer died and three were injured. An armed individual died as a result and others managed to flee. The clashes led to (narco) roadblocks to prevent officers from advancing (coded separately). 2 fatalities, 3 injuries.

On 3 September 2024, in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, two armed men from a criminal group clashed with the municipal police during a police patrol. A police officer was injured and a government worker was also injured with a stray bullet. Two people were arrested. 2 injured.

Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in Los Ramones, Nuevo Leon, three people were killed and their bodies were found burned inside a pickup truck on the El Ayancual highway. At least two of the victims had been reported as missing. 3 fatalities.

Around 1 August 2024 (as reported), in Los Organos de San Agustin, Guerrero, at least a person was killed and the human remains were found in plastic bags with messages next to them. At least 1 fatality.

source: Borderland Beat; El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada
notes: On 3 August 2024, in La Loma, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals traveling in several vehicles attacked military officers and elements of the National Guard on patrol leading to the death of at least nine people. The attack is considered a retaliation for the arrest of the leader of the Sinaloa Cartel alias El Mayo. At least 9 fatalities.
Around 16 August 2024 (as reported), in La Sabana, Guerrero, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic bags and a message next to the body. 1 fatality.

Around 15 August 2024 (as reported), in Paso Limonero, Guerrero, a person was killed and the decapitated head was found inside a cooler and the human remains were found inside plastic bags. A message was found at the site. 1 fatality.

Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in El Salto, Guerrero, one person was killed and the body was found dismembered and the face skinned on a road. There were three posters left by the remains. 1 fatality.

Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), around Las Plazuelas, Guerrero, a person was killed and the body was found in pieces along the road between Las Plazuelas and El Salto. Several messages were found. According to local sources, the human remains were taken out of a vehicle and scattered on the road. The victim's face was skinned off and his remains were tied with ropes. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); Antena San Luis; El Norte; La Jornada; Milenio
notes: On 21 August 2024, in Villaflores, Chiapas, unidentified gunmen shot and injured a journalist at his home after they entered his house in barrio Esquipulas. The victim is the director of the Villaflores.com.mx website, which reports information on acts of violence in the state. Local sources added that the journalist had referred to the fee charged to merchants and producers in that area, which connects to the south with La Concordia.
On 3 September 2024, in Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes, two armed individuals in a vehicle approached a man in his vehicle accompanied by a woman and killed him. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2024, in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a former municipal police officer in Colonia Carlos Salinas de Gortari (drive-by). 1 fatality.
Around 11 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and only the head was found inside a cooler with a message outside Bar La Cueva del Peludo. 1 fatality.
Around 13 September 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of violence and wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Postal. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2024, in Altamirano, Chiapas, around 25 armed members of the Autonomous Peoples for the Protection of the Indigenous People of Chiapas abducted two men. One of them was abducted from his house in the neighborhood of Guadalupe. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

source: Diario Cambio 22; Diario Contra Poder en Chiapas
notes: On 11 September 2024, in Fraccion la Esperanza el Tumbi, Chiapas, there was an armed clash between rival members of criminal groups over the control for the territory. According to one of the sources, police reports state that the clash was between the CJNG and the CCYG. This event was replicated in another location (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

notes: On 11 September 2024, in Villaflores, Chiapas, there was an armed clash between military forces, National Guard and suspected members of the CJNG. A National Guard officer was killed, and according to one of the sources, five other people were killed. According to local sources, a girl was hit by a stray bullet and was among the dead. Nine people were arrested, among them a suspected leader of the CJNG in Chiapas. Another version of the event is that before the military intervention, there was a clash between the CJNG and the CCYG. About 6 fatalities.

On 11 September 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, armed men in a vehicle intercepted a couple and shot at them (drive-by) in Colonia Chihuahua 2094. Both victims were injured.
Around 12 September 2024 (as reported), in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, a man was killed and his body was found with the 'tiro de gracia' in colonia Panamericana. 1 fatality.

notes: On 8 September 2024, in Coyame, Chihuahua, there was an armed clash between municipal police officers and armed individuals (likely gang members as the clash occurred amid clashes between The Sinaloa Cartel and La Empresa Gang in the municipality of Ojinaga). notes: On 7 September 2024, in Ciudad Juarez, Chihuahua, several armed individuals shot at people who were celebrating a 'quinceanera' party in a house between Marcelo Caraveo and Santa Isabel streets, in Colonia San Felipe del Real. notes: On 8 September 2024, in Manuel Benavides, Chihuahua, members of the Sinaloa Cartel and La Empresa Gang (armed wing of the Juarez cartel) clashed and two people were killed. notes: Around 8 September 2024 (as reported), in El Mulato, Chihuahua, a person was killed during a clash between members of the Sinaloa Cartel and La Empresa Gang, armed wing of the Juarez cartel. Authorities later deployed at least 70 army officers to reinforce security in the area. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 9 September 2024 (as reported), in El Mulato, Chihuahua, two people were killed and their bodies were found in front of a funeral home. notes: On 12 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Miguel Hidalgo, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Polanco. The victim was a leader of the Caborca Cartel. 1 fatality.

According to the victim, she was abducted by a taxi driver who took her to a house on Baja California Street. Following the location of the victim, a safe house in which other kidnapped persons were held was located (coded separately). 1 injured.

Around 5 September 2024 (between 5 - 6 September), in Lagos de Moreno, Jalisco, a man was kidnapped and beaten by unknown individuals. notes: Around 9 September 2024 (between 8 - 9 September), near Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found together with a threatening message in and around a car on the parking lot of the Metropolitan Security Complex C5, by km. 3.5 of Periferico Ecologico road. The threatening message was signed by the 'Mencho Special Operations Group (GOEM)' of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel and suspectedly addressed to the security officers that work in the Complex C5. GOEM is suspectedly composed of former state police officers. According to security cameras' footage, two men parked the car, placed some of the human remains on the floor around the vehicle and set it on fire before leaving in another vehicle driven by a third person. The victim was a businessman that was abducted in Solesta, Puebla, on 8 September 2024 and who according to the authorities was also dedicated to illicit activities and the event is related to a dispute over the control of the territory. 1 fatality.

On 9 September 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, according to witnesses, armed individuals driving four motorbikes shot at two men, killing one and injuring another, in the intersection of 133 Oriente y 2 B Sur streets (drive-by). On 12 September 2024, in Tehuacan, Puebla, there was an armed clash between five armed individuals and the municipal police after another armed clash among armed individuals (coded separately). There were no casualties. Five people were arrested.
