notes: On 4 September 2024, in San Jose del Llano, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between two rival gangs. At least two people were killed. Due to the clashes, schools were closed in the municipality. At least 2 fatalities.

On 11 September 2024, in La Loma (Loma de Redo), Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between rival armed groups. This event was replicated in other locations in the municipality (coded separately). The armed men also shot at a vehicle from a farm company. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September. Casualties unknown.

On 10 September 2024, in Los Arrayanes, Sinaloa, armed individuals and army officers clashed, resulting in the dead of an officer. Officers also seized four vehicles (two of them armored) and weapons. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately) and a persecution that army officers initiated on Mexico 15 road (coded separately). 1 fatality.

notes: On 7 September 2024, in Caborca, Sonora, armed individuals opened fire at military officers leading to the death of two armed individuals and the injury of two soldiers. Both victims were injured. 2 injuries.

On 20 September 2024, in El Alcalde, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

On 20 September 2024, in El Llano Grande, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

On 20 September 2024, in Los Charcos, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

On 13 September 2024, in Charo, Michoacan, inmates of a prison clashed over control of illegal activities inside the prison, such as the sale of drugs, alcohol and 'protection' to inmates. The event occurred at the High Security Penitentiary Center for High Impact Crimes. The event left 26 injured and 45 prisoners who were relocated to different prisons. The Penitentiary police intervened to control the crowd and used tear gas and riot gear. The inmates used sharp weapons, sticks and other objects.

Around 12 September 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found wrapped in a blanket between fraccionamiento Arko San Antonio and Colonia La Mintzita. 1 fatality.
On 14 September 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Dieciocho de Mayo. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and his hands tied up on the Morelia- Patzcuaro highway in Uruaplilla. 1 fatality.
Around 18 September 2024 (as reported), in Morelia, Michoacan de Ocampo, a woman was killed and her body was found close to fraccionamiento Arko San Pedro with a message next to the body. 1 fatality.
On 14 September 2024, in Guarachanillo, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between the municipal police and armed men. There were no casualties.

source: La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 14 September 2024, in Guarachanillo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed men attacked the Kuarichas of Tzitzio community police after a patrol where a narco camp was found near the Patamban hill. Two community police officers were injured. The armed men also set a (narco) road block with three vehicles that set on fire on the road to Patamban. According to residents, members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) had previously entered the community and demanded payment of five thousand pesos per hectare of avocado orchards.
Around 15 September 2024 (as reported), in Tangancicuaro de Arista, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied up and wrapped in a blanket and plastic. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals on a motorbike shot and injured a 15 years-old boy on Juarez avenue, between Rafael J. Rubio and Ignacio Torres de Guzman streets, in Colonia Adolfo Lopez Mateos (drive-by).
On 12 September 2024, in Cuautla, Morelos, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was working as a parking street helper in a drive-by in Colonia 19 de Febrero. 1 fatality.

source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota
notes: On 17 September 2024, in Tetelcingo, Morelos, five armed individuals in vehicles shot at people who were organizing a protest at the intersection of 16 de Septiembre Street and Miguel Hidalgo Avenue (drive-by) to protest against the arrest of six people on 11 September. The perpetrators attempted to flee but were shot by another group of people, initiating a clash that resulted in one dead and one injured. After the clash, residents detained four police officers and seized six police cars (coded separately) to demand the release of six people who were arrested on 11 September. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, armed individuals on a motorcycle chased a man and shot at him (drive-by) causing the man to crash into a pole. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Cuernavaca, Morelos, two men were killed and their bodies were found beaten, with signs of torture and with their hands and feet tied on the Cuernavaca-Acapulco highway at the height of the Cuernavaca bridge.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Jiutepec, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and with signs of torture. 1 fatality.

Six individuals fled the scene in several vehicles.
Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Xochitepec, Morelos, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied up and tape around his face on the Cuernavaca-Acapulco highway. 1 fatality.
On 18 September 2024, in Xochitepec, Morelos, two armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Los Sabinos, Nuevo Leon, two women were killed and their dismembered bodies were found in the intersection of Anillo Periferico and Allende-Cadereyta roads, together with a threatening message written on a cardboard. On 17 September 2024, in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, armed men traveling in several vehicles opened fire and killed a person in Colonia Villas de Carrizalejo and kidnapped two people. The whereabouts of the kidnapped individuals remain unknown. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in San Nicolas de los Garza, Nuevo Leon, two armed men shot at two teenagers inside a barber shop and then fled the scene in a vehicle driven by a third individual in Colonia Unidad Laboral. 2 fatalities.

notes: Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Juchitan de Zaragoza, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his body was found inside a plastic bag on a path in Colonia Margarita Maza de Juarez. 1 fatality.

notes: On 20 September 2024, in Amozoc de Mota, Puebla, armed men entered the home of a man and shot and killed a man inside a rehabilitation center. A message was found next to the body. The victim was identified as a retired military officer and former Morena candidate for mayor. 1 fatality.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Palmar de Bravo, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a plastic bag with a message next to the body on the Puebla-Orizaba highway at KM 204.6. 1 fatality.

The victim was suspectedly mistaken by the perpetrators, who intended to attack another person. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, two armed individuals shot at people in a park between Isla Zanzibar and Isla Guadalupe streets, in Fraccionamiento Paseos del Mar, killing two men and injuring another. The perpetrators fled on a motorbike. The attack is suspectedly linked to a drug deal. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Milenio; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 16 September 2024, in Guadalupe Victoria (El Atoron), Sinaloa, unidentified armed groups clashed, resulting in the death of three people, one of them with 'tiro de gracia'. Several vehicles and the premises of three ranches were shot and set on fire. This event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). 3 fatalities.
Around 12 September 2024 (as reported), in Caborca, Sonora, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and a message. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Caborca, Sonora, armed individuals opened fire at military officers during an operation who repelled the aggression killing three armed individuals and arrested eight in fraccionamiento Palma Dorada. Six of those arrested were reported as minors. Military seized weapons, cartridges, vests and magazines. 3 fatalities.
On 16 September 2024, in Sonoyta, Sonora, army officers and suspected gang members clashed. Army officers arrested an individual. Casualties unknown.

On 16 September 2024, in Hermosillo, Sonora, armed men broke into a home and set fire to a piece of furniture in an attempt to burn the house down in Colonia Fuente de Piedra. The attack is being linked to intimidations against the owner of the home who was inside. There were no injuries.

On 16 September 2024, in Golfo de Santa Clara, Sonora, army and police officers and suspected members of the Sinaloa Cartel clashed. Two to five people died depending on the source, and 20 were arrested. The armed individuals wore bulletproof vests with the text 'Plebada de 7 4' written on them. The officers seized several 4x4 vehicles, fireweapons and eight explosive devices. Fatalities coded as 2 based on the latest report.
On 13 September 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, according to witnesses, several armed men entered a place and killed an electrician worker in fraccionamiento Los Laureles. 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Cardenas, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found with a threatening message written on a cardboard in a house on Zaragoza street, in front of El Eden and Zaragoza hotels. The message was suspectedly addressed to people involved in robberies and extortion. 1 fatality.
Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Cardenas, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found inside a house in Colonia Agua Zula with a message next to the body. 1 fatality.

Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Tabasco state (coded to Villahermosa), members of the CJNG held and killed two members of La Barredora gang. The event was recorded in video and shared on social media. 2 fatalities.

Around 14 September 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and the body was found with a message which referred to disputes between antagonistic criminal groups. The body was found in Gaviotas, in El Milagro ranch. 1 fatality.

notes: On 16 September 2024, in Acayucan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed men got off a van and entered a house on Patricio Chirinos street, on a side of Acayucan-Soteapan state road in the community of Comejen, and shot and killed two women and a man. Two other men got to flee the house. The victims were relatives of a local rural leader. 3 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 18 September 2024, in Soconusco, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two armed men on a motorcycle opened fire at a woman at her home. The woman died as a result. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Texistepec, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on a road leading to Francisco I. Madero. The body had a cardboard with a threatening message against traitors ('chapulines') and a member of the Secretariat of Public Safety (SSP). 1 fatality.

Around 17 September 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of torture, gunshot and stab wounds and wrapped in a blanket on Salamanca-Celaya road. 1 fatality.

notes: On 20 September 2024, in Berriozabal, Chiapas, an armed group broke into a home, kidnapped a man and set fire to the home. A three-year-old girl was killed inside the home from the fire. The victim's whereabouts are unknown. Three men from a criminal group were arrested. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Manuel Ojinaga, Chihuahua, eleven people were killed and their bodies were found wrapped in plastic bags near the facilities of the Federal Electricity Commission (CFE). Two of the bodies were decapitated. One of the bodies was identified as a member of La Linea Gang. A message was found next to the bodies. 11 fatalities.

notes: On 18 August 2024, in Ixtaczoquitlan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with the 'tiro de gracia' in a sugar cane field on the Campo Chico to Zapoapan road. 1 fatality.

notes: Around 6 September 2024 (as reported), near Fortin de las Flores, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his dismembered and burnt body was found with signs of torture in a car on km. 3 of Los Otates - Monte Salas road leading to the municipality of Huatusco, which is part of 143 Fortin - Huatusco federal road, by a place known as 'El Chayotal'. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 8 September 2024 (as reported), in Fortin de las Flores, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found mutilated, with signs of torture and half burned inside a car at a point named El Chayotal on the Fortin-Huatusco highway. 1 fatality.

On 14 September 2024, in El Palmito, Sinaloa, according to residents there was an armed clash between armed men. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). On 16 September 2024, in El Palmito, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed. Authorities arrived to the place and seized six fire weapons and an armored van, and destroyed a camp. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Loreto, Zacatecas, two women were killed and their bodies were found inside a burning vehicle in the downtown area. 2 fatalities.

On 21 September 2024, in Calzada Larga, Chiapas, there was an armed clash between criminal members and the National Guard during a patrol in Colonia Calzada Larga. Five armed men were killed and two officers were injured. One armed men was arrested. 5 fatalities.

On 21 September 2024, in Manzanillo, Colima, armed men in a vehicle intercepted and shot at two men in another vehicle in a drive-by shooting. One man was killed and another one was injured. The victim's vehicle crashed after the car chase. 1 fatality.

On 21 September 2024, in Cuernavaca, Morelos, according to witnesses, a man was killed and another man was injured inside a workshop in Colonia Miguel Hidalgo. The perpetrators are suspected to be two men who were seen fleeing the scene. 1 fatality.

On 21 September 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, two armed individuals opened fire and shot a man several times and then fled the scene in fraccionamiento Paseos del Mar. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
On 21 September 2024, in La Union, Zacatecas, there was an armed clash among the state police, National Guard, and military officers against suspected gang members. Casualties unknown.
Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Zacatecas, Zacatecas, two men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture. 2 fatalities.

Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Jojutla, Morelos, two men were killed and one of the bodies was found tied and inside a trunk and the other next to the car beaten and shot to death in Colonia Nicolas Bravo. The second victim was involved in drug dealing activities. 2 fatalities.
Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in China, Nuevo Leon, three people were killed and their bodies were found close to the El Cuchillo dam. One of the bodies was wrapped in a rug. 3 fatalities.

Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, at least three people were killed and their human remains were found inside a vehicle in Colonia La Loma with a message signed by the CJNG. 3 fatalities.

On 22 September 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, there was an armed clash between armed individuals in Colonia Mision del Sol 2. One person was injured. One person was arrested. Also in Ciudad Obregon, rival groups clashed in other colonias, including Real de Sevilla, Mision del Real, Alameda, Villa Bonita, Matias Mendez, and Urbi Villa. Suspectedly, these clashes are related and came after the arrest of a person in colonia Prados del Tepeyac.

On 22 September 2024, in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, armed men clashed with National Guard officers in colonia Montecarlo. The clash ensued amid several clashes between rival groups recorded in other colonias (coded separately). Military officers patrolled the city using helicopters. Casualties unknown.
On 23 September 2024, in Playas de Rosarito, Baja California, a couple arrived on a motorcycle and shot and killed two men in the downtown sector of the city. 2 fatalities.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: On 23 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, two men on a motorcycle shot at a butcher shop in Colonia La Forestal injuring a 15-year old boy and killing a woman. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

On 23 September 2024, in San Jeronimito, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals ambushed elements of the Marines on surveillance patrol who repelled the aggression. One armed individual was killed and the marine arrested nine armed individuals. Officials seized weapons, magazines, cartridge and tactical equipment. 1 fatality.
Around 23 September 2024 (as reported), in El Salto, Jalisco, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture inside a drum in Colonia El Castillo. 1 fatality.
