Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), near Hidalgo del Parral, Chihuhua, a man was killed and his body was found with the head covered in tape, the hands tied, and a message that said 'This happened to you for stealing cars', on km. 50 of the road leading to Parral. 1 fatality.
Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and the body was found beaten up and hanged from a tree. 1 fatality.

Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), near Zamora de Hidalgo, Michoacan de Ocampo, a woman was killed and her burnt body was found on km. 3,5 of Libramiento Norte road, near Colonia El Mirador. 1 fatality.
Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Celaya, Guanajuato, a man was shot and killed by armed men in a vehicle in a drive-by shooting on Avenida Las Torres. 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Charo, Michoacan, a man was killed and his body was found beheaded. According to the investigations, the victim was killed around four days before. 1 fatality.
On 21 October 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed (drive-by) two men in Colonia Girasoles. 2 fatalities.
On 21 October 2024, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, an off-duty municipal police officer was shot and killed by armed individuals in a vehicle in a drive-by shooting in Plaza del Comercio. 1 fatality.
On 21 October 2024, in Morelia, Michoacan, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man who was walking his dog in colonia Chapultepec Norte (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, in Silao de la Victoria, Guanajuato, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in a drive-by shooting in Colonia Barrio Nuevo. The event occurred after a fight in which the victim was involved. 1 fatality.
Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, a person was killed and the body was found burned in colonia Guayabitos. 1 fatality.
Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and the body was found wrapped in blankets and tied up in Cerro de las Mitras. 1 fatality.

On 22 October 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals opened fire from a vehicle at a taxi driver and a passenger (drive-by) in Colonia Paseo del Nogal. Both were injured as a result. 2 injuries.

Around 22 October 2024 (month of), in Nueva Rosita, Coahuila, a man was killed and the body was found in an advanced state of decomposition with bondages around his feet in Ejido San Jose. 1 fatality.
Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Villa de Pozos, San Luis Potosi, a man was killed and his body was found tied and on the side of the road close to Colonia Los Silos. 1 fatality.
Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Abelardo L. Rodriguez, Morelos, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside a cemetary in Abelardo Rodriguez. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals on a motorcycle opened fire at a man from a moving motorcycle (drive-by) in Colonia Cerro de la Silla. The man was injured and transported to the hospital. 1 injury.

Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found tied to a stretcher in Colonia Cima de las Mitras with signs of torture and wrapped in sheets. 1 fatality.

Around 23 October 2024 (month of), in San Jeronimo Caleras, Puebla, a person was killed and the body was found tied and with a plastic bag covering the victim's face. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.
Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a couple was killed and the bodies were found tied and covered with a blanket in Colonia La Joya. 2 fatalities.

Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Coyuca de Benitez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the dismembered body was found on the Acapulco-Zihuatanejo highway. The event is linked to a clash that took place in the vicinity of Tecpan de Galeana (coded separately). 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Minatitlan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and the decapitated head was found at the entrance to the state traffic police station in Colonia Petrolera inside a suitcase. The remains of the body were found on the Cosoleacaque-Acayucan highway. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2024, in Tequesquitengo, Morelos, armed individuals traveling in two vehicles opened fire at a man while he was driving on the Galeana-Tequesquitengo highway and shot him (drive-by). The man died as a result. 1 fatality.
Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Tijuana, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found with hands and feet tied and covered with a plastic bag in Colonia Centro. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2024, in Zamora Pico de Oro, Chiapas, two men arrived at the home of the former mayor of Marques de Comillas and shot and killed him in Colonia La Candelaria. The victim was affiliated with the Labor party. 1 fatality.

Around 25 October 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a man was killed and his body was found underneath a bridge at the ranch Acachapan y Colmena. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, around Caborca, Sonora, there was an armed clash between armed individuals from a criminal group and the military forces and ministerial police. The clash ensued while the officers were carrying out an investigation to look for a man that had been kidnapped a week before on the Caborca-Altar road. Four armed men were killed. 4 fatalities.

On 18 October 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a motorbike shot at houses and vehicles on Yuca street, in Colonia Los Ebanos (drive-by). Armed residents responded and fired back. Police officers later arrested the three people (a man and two underage boys) involved in the shooting, and seized a fireweapon and drugs. Casualties unknown.

On 20 October 2024, in Los Tanques, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed. Officers arrived at the place and found seven burning vehicles, one of them armored. This event is suspectedly linked to an armed clash that took place in Higueras de Abuya the same day (coded separately), and is likely part of the war between 'Los Chapitos' and 'Los Mayitos' factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Casualties unknown.

Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Mulege, Baja California, a gang leader in the community of Guerrero Negro was shot and killed by armed individuals in a vehicle who intercepted him (drive-by). The victim was placed on the latest criminal map as the one who controlled the flow of weapons and drugs in the northern part of the state. 1 fatality.

On 3 August 2024, in Angamacutiro de la Union, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed men in two vehicles intercepted two women and kidnapped them. One of the women was identified as the current councilwoman of Penjamillo and former mayor for the PRD, and she had received threats when she was seeking re-election to the mayor's office. She was also the sister of a former local PRD deputy who was killed in Morelia in 2020. The whereabouts of both women remain unknown.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova; Riodoce
notes: On 21 October 2024, in Carboneras, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between suspected members of the Sinaloa Cartel and the military forces. This event is related to a similar clash reported in Alcoyonqui community in the same municipality. During both clashes a total of 19 people were killed. It is unknown the exact number of people who was killed in this location. 19 fatalities split across two clashes coded in Alcoyonqui and Carboneras, 9 fatalities coded in this event.

On 24 October 2024, in Acambaro, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals set an explosive device in a car outside the Public Security building which exploded. Three officers were injured as a result. The attack also caused damages to the building and two homes. Local authorities, later arrested two men for this incident and another one in Jerecuaro (coded separately). 3 injuries.

source: Diario de Morelos; El Universal (Mexico); La Silla Rota
notes: On 24 October 2024, in Jerecuaro, Guanajuato, unknown armed individuals set a bomb into a car which exploded in the historic center damaging buildings and a municipal police car. Local authorities, later arrested two men for this incident and another one in Acambaro (coded separately). There were no injuries.

Around 9 August 2024 (as reported), around Uruapan, Michoacan, two people were killed and their bodies were found burned inside a vehicle that was set on fire on the Uruapan-Paracho highway. 2 fatalities.

Around 10 August 2024 (as reported), in Soledad de Graciano Sanchez, San Luis Potosi, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in several plastic bags with a rope on boulevard del Rio Santiago. 1 fatality.

Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man was killed and his body was found in several bags inside a trunk in Colonia Antorcha Campesina. The man was a missing person. 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2024, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at a car on Plan Ayala street, in Colonia Tierra y Libertad (drive-by). The driver tried to flee and crashed the vehicle into a house, resulting injured. The perpetrators fled. Also in Uruapan, armed individuals in a vehicle shot at a man who was driving on Miguel Hidalgo street, in Colonia Infonavit Rosa de Castilla (drive-by). The victim tried to flee towards Colonia Antorcha Campesina, where he attempted to run over the attackers who chased him. The victim crashed his vehicle into a house in the intersection of Gonzalo Lopez street and Wenceslao Victoria avenue, where he was finally shot and killed. A resident was collaterally injured by a lost bullet. The perpetrators fled in a motorbike. 1 fatality.
On 2 October 2024, in Atoyac de Alvarez, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the former Morena councilor together with a companion at the municipal cemetary. 2 fatalities.

On 9 October 2024, in Uruapan, Michoacan de Ocampo, a man clashed with municipal police officers when he resisted to stop at a police control on Urani street, in Colonia Santa Barbara. The man shot at the officers, initiating a persecution until he lost control of his vehicle on Maruata avenue, where he crashed. The man got off the vehicle and entered a store, where he died. 1 fatality.
On 19 October 2024, in Soledad de Graciano Sanchez, San Luis Potosi, several armed men shot and killed a man when he was driving on Fraccionamiento Residencial del Bosque. 1 fatality.

Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), in Villahermosa, Tabasco, a state police officer was killed and his beheaded body was found. An armed group had held him and interrogated him under unspecified circumstances. 1 fatality.
On 25 October 2024, in Chihuahua, Chihuahua, two armed individuals opened fire and shot a man in Colonia Urbi Villas del Prado. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.

Around 25 October 2024 (as reported), in Union de San Antonio, Jalisco, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied close to the ranch San Angel on the Union de San Antonio-Lagos de Moreno highway. 1 fatality.
On 25 October 2024, in Benito Juarez, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two armed men entered a home in Colonia Residencial Los Olivos and shot a man to death. 1 fatality.
On 25 October 2024, in Heroica Puebla de Zaragoza, Puebla, unknown armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty municipal transit officer outside the Las Animas Walmart. 1 fatality.
On 26 October 2024, in Escarcega, Campeche, two men arrived at a business and opened fire at the owner and hairdresser in Colonia Benito Juarez. The man was injured as a result. 1 injury.
On 26 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Iztapalapa, two armed individuals attacked and killed a man at the Central de Abasto (Ceda). One of the perpetrators was found and arrested. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Venustiano Carranza, armed individuals shot at least 30 times and killed a 19 year old man in Colonia Morelos. The victim was linked to the group La Union Tepito. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in San Pedro Huitzapula Norte, Guerrero, there was an armed clash between armed men and members of the San Juan Communal Militia. Thirty minutes later, the same armed individuals opened fire at the home of the Commissioner (unknown if he was inside) and members of the community police San Juan repelled the aggression. There were no injuries.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), near Tetitlan, Guerrero, four people were killed and their bodies were found in the outskirts of the community with signs of torture. Later, two other victims were found, all wearing military-type clothing and boots. All the victims are suspected to be members of the GNG. 6 fatalities.

On 26 October 2024, in La Cantera, Michoacan de Ocampo, a group of armed individuals in vehicles shot at the base of the municipal police (likely with police officers inside) and a police patrol (drive-by). According to the local Tenencia Chief (assistant to the municipal public administration), after that several armed individuals tried to force their way into his house but failed to do so, fired several shots into the air and left. It is suspected that the perpetrators were the same individuals who shot at the police station moments earlier.There were no casualties
On 26 October 2024, in Pueblo Nuevo, Morelos, a couple of armed individuals shot a man on his motorcycle on the Galeana-Cuautla highway and then fled the scene. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in Tlaquiltenango, Morelos, two armed individuals shot and killed a man drinking alcoholic beverages in Colonia Centro. The man died as a result in a hospital in Jojutla. 1 fatality.
On 26 October 2024, close to Campo Eureka, Sinaloa, armed groups engaged in an armed clash. There were no injuries.

On 26 October 2024, in Villahermosa, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals opened fire and shot at seven off-duty state police officers in Colonia Indeco. Four were killed and three were injured as a result. 4 fatalities, 3 injuries.

On 26 October 2024, in Fresnillo, Zacatecas, at least two armed men chased and opened fire from a moving car (drive-by) at least four people in a vehicle, including the queen of the Fresnillo fair close to Colonia Benito Juarez. Two men were arrested as a result and there were no injuries.

source: El Blog del Narco; Entorno Informativo
notes: On 6 October 2024, in Caborca, Sonora, there was an armed clash between military officers and the National Guard against a leader of Los Salazar Gang. The leader and another member were arrested. Weapons were seized. There were no fatalities.

source: Borderland Beat; La Silla Rota; Mural
notes: Around 13 October 2024 (as reported), in Ojuelos de Jalisco, Jalisco, five men were killed and their bodies were found decapitated on the San Luis Potosi-San Juan de Los Lagos highway. One of the victims had disappeared on 7 September 2024 from Colonia Las Huertas, in Tlaquepaque. 5 fatalities.

source: El Faro de la Costa Chica; El Norte
notes: On 21 October 2024, in Cuajinicuilapa, Guerrero, an unidentified armed group beaten and kidnapped the councilor of the municipality of the PVEM party on his way to Ometepec. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
Around 20 October 2024 (as reported), in Las Labradas, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a blanket on km. 48. 1 fatality.

On 1 October 2024, in La Placeta, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed men against the National Guard, state police, and military officers during a patrol. Three men were arrested. Drugs were seized. There were no casualties.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Noroeste; Riodoce
notes: On 26 September 2024, in Loberas, Sinaloa, suspected members of Los Chapitos Gang and Los Mayitos Gang clashed. Eight men were killed and another was injured. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). 8 fatalities.

source: La Silla Rota; La Verdad; Riodoce; Tiempo; Zona Franca
notes: On 16 September 2024, around Coronado, Chihuahua, members of La Linea gang linked to the Juarez Cartel and Los Salgueiro gang linked to the Sinaloa Cartel clashed on km. 46+200 of the road heading from Parral to Jimenez, resulting in nine dead (six of which were burnt). A woman who was travelling in a bus nearby and a man were injured. 9 fatalities.

Around 15 September 2024 (between 27 July - 7 November), in Tijuana, Baja California, a 16-years old boy was killed and his body was found on 7 November. Five armed men had abducted the victim from his house on Rumorosa street, in Colonia Felipa Velazquez, on 27 July 2024. Three suspects were arrested on 30 September 2024. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Las Casas, Chihuahua, according to human rights groups, members of criminal groups linked to drug dealing attacked, threatened and displaced residents of the Raramuri indigenous community. According to residents, one person was killed. This incident was replicated in other localities of the municipality (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Placeres, Chihuahua, according to human rights groups, members of criminal groups linked to drug dealing, attacked, threatened and displaced residents of the Raramuri indigenous community. This incident was replicated in other localities of the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

Around 17 August 2024, close to El Aserradero, Nayarit, members of the CJNG and the Sinaloa Cartel engaged in an armed clash between Aserradero and La Guacamaya. Seven men were killed as a result. 7 fatalities.

Around 17 August 2024 (as reported), in Conitaca, Sinaloa, three men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and one of the men's hands were tied. The bodies were found on a road leading to El Aguaje. One of the men was linked to the Sinaloa Cartel as collaborator of El Mayo and was being searched by the United States Department of the Treasury (Foreign Assets Control OFAC) who was offering a reward of 4 million dollars. 3 fatalities.

Around 14 October 2024 (between 12 October - 16 October), in Santa Clara Ocoyucan, Puebla, a woman was killed and her body was found on 16 October semi-naked and with signs of violence in Colonia La Cantera. The woman was identified as a missing woman since the weekend. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2024, in Tehuacan, Puebla, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and police forces in Colonia San Miguel. The police were at the scene investigating a shooting that took place earlier that day in the same Colonia (coded separately). There were no casualties.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); AFN - Tijuana; Diario de Morelos; El Norte; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Milenio; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 17 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, two armed men shot at three people on 5 de Mayo street, near the junction with Motolinia street, killing a man and injuring another man and a woman. The woman is an alternate local congresswoman of the coalition 'Va por Mexico' (formed by PAN, PRI and PRD parties), a trans activist, and leader of local vendors. Her mother, also a vendors' leader, affirmed that they had been threatened by La Union Tepito. Both women were arrested in 2021 on charges of extorsion and organized robbery. Authorities later arrested the two perpetrators and a woman accomplice. The injured man died on 11 November 2024. 2 fatalities.

Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Tixtla de Guerrero, Guerrero, the mayor of Chilpancingo and PRD member was killed and his body was found decapitated in Colonia Villa del Roble. The head was found on top of a car and the body was covered with a sheet inside the car. Suspectedly the attack was committed by the Los Ardillos gang and on 12 November 2024, authorities arrested the police officer in charge of the Public Security Secretary for holding links with Los Ardillos gang and being involved in this attack. This information was given by a man who had been kidnapped by this gang and was later found dead (coded separately). Local sources, indicated that the killing of the mayor was due to his lack for cooperation with the criminal group. The arrested official is a lawyer specializing in Oral Trial and Accusatory Criminal Procedure. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2024, in Carmen, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man outside a clandestine beer store in the intersection of Osasuna street and Paseo del Jaral avenue, in colonia Villas del Jaral (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 12 August 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, according to the victim, two armed men shot and injured a man as he was leaving his home on Abedul and Joel Garza streets, in Colonia Real de Villa. The location of the event is known as a drugs selling point. 1 injured.

Around 10 August 2024 (between 9 - 10 August), in La Laja, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found naked, with signs of torture, and his hands tied to his back and a rope around his neck near in the limits with Linares. The victim was a businessman who was kidnapped on 9 August 2024 while at his business in the intersection of Escobedo and Cuitlahuac streets, in downtown Montemorelos, and who had been shot a few weeks earlier (details of the incident unknown). 1 fatality.

Around 12 August 2024 (as reported), in Montemorelos, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found naked, with his hands and feet tied and with signs of torture in the intersection of Reynaldo Gutierrez and Eleuterio Gonzalez streets, in Colonia Jose Maria Morelos. 1 fatality.

On 11 August 2024, in Ciudad Santa Catarina, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed men shot at a group of friends that were in front of a narco house used as a drugs selling point on San Marino street, between Perimetral Norte avenue and Bahia de la Paz, in colonia San Gilberto. Three men were killed. 3 fatalities.

Around 31 July 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Rio Bravo, Tamaulipas, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered next to a message signed by the Gulf Cartel and addressed to Los Escorpiones. 1 fatality.

Around 31 July 2024 (as reported), in Almoloya de Juarez, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found on the side of a soccer field with his hands tied and an injury to his neck close to fraccionamiento Colinas del Sol. 1 fatality.

On 12 August 2024, around Loza de los Padres, Guanajuato, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man in a drive-by around the Santa Ana bridge. The victim was a security guard. It is unknown for who the victim was working and if he was working at the moment of the attack. 1 fatality.
On 13 September 2024, in General Teran, Nuevo Leon, unidentified armed individuals shot at municipal police patrols. Casualties unknown.

On 9 September 2024, in Portaceli, Sinaloa, armed individuals shot at two people who were in a car killing a man and injuring a woman on the road heading to Ejido El Melon. As a result of the shots received, the vehicle caught fire. Witnesses indicate that the attack occurred when the victims' vehicle did not stop at a (narco) roadblock and the armed men at the checkpoint began shooting. Another version indicates that the driver panicked upon seeing the roadblock and that is why the driver lost control of the vehicle and jumped the roadblock. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 25 September 2024, in General Teran, Nuevo Leon, armed individuals broke into the Public Security building and opened fire at municipal police. In their escape, armed individuals threw tire punctures on the road to avoid persecution. Later the armed individuals clashes with police officers in Los Ramones (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 9 October 2024, in Los Ramirez, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, armed individuals in a car shot at a van on Lazaro Cardenas street, near Dorados de Villa street and Del Senor de la Expiracion church, killing a man and injuring another (drive-by). 1 fatality, 1 injured.

On 17 October 2024, in General Teran, Nuevo Leon, state and municipal police officers clashed with suspected members of the Cartel del Noreste in front of a police station on Plutarco Elias Calles avenue. A member of the cartel died, and the rest of them fled towards Montemorelos. This event is part of three clashes between authorities and the CDN that took place in Nuevo Leon the same day (coded separately). 1 fatality.

On 26 August 2024, in Cuautitlan Izcalli, Mexico, three individuals attacked and injured a man on Villa del Carbon avenue, in Colonia San Pablo de los Gallos (the specific type of attack has not been specified). An ambulance transferred the injured man to his house on Hidalgo street, in Colonia San Juan Atlamica, where two armed individuals on a motorbike arrived, and one of them got off the vehicle, and shot and killed the victim. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Ciudad de Allende, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, at least two armed men followed a man to 'Chayo' hair salon on Benito Juarez and Mariano Jimenez streets, and one of them entered and shot and killed him. The victim was the owner of a transportation company who had been attacked and threatened in the past. 1 fatality.

On 26 August 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man in his house on Liberia street, between Nicaragua and Quebec streets, in Colonia Prados de la Cieneguita. The house was used to store stolen goods and was frequented by drug users. 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2024, in Garcia, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, at least two armed individuals got off a taxi, and shot and killed a man in his house on Villanueva street, in Colonia Las Villas. The victim's underage daughter was in the house and was not injured. 1 fatality.
On 25 August 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, at least two armed individuals shot at people in Colonia Santa Martha, killing three and injuring one. 3 fatalities, 1 injured.

On 29 August 2024, in Ciudad General Escobedo, Nuevo Leon, four suspected members of an organized criminal organization who travelled in a van refused to stop at a police control in Colonia Laderas de San Miguel, leading to a persecution and an armed clash. The van crashed on Libramiento Norte, near the path to Las Pedreras, where police officers arrested two men (one of them was a minor), seized two fireweapons, and rescued a man they had abducted. Two other perpetrators fled. The armed individuals carried a narco message that indicated that they intended to kill the abducted man. The arrested men are suspected to be involved in the killing of a police officer on 4 July 2024 in Colonia Jardines de Escobedo II and the killing of three people on 25 August 2024 in Colonia Santa Martha (coded separately). There were no casualties.
On 18 September 2024, in Victoria de Durango, Durango, at least two armed men broke into a house and shot and killed a man in Colonia Cerro de la Campana. 1 fatality.

source: El Blog del Narco; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Verdad; Riodoce
notes: On 14 September 2024, around Culiacancito, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between armed men and military forces around Bella Vista. Three armed men were killed. Six military officers were injured. Three vehicles were seized. 3 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 4 August 2024 (between 1 - 8 August), in Coatepec, Veracruz, a person was killed, and the body was found on 8 August. The victim was kidnapped on 1 August by armed individuals. Five people, including two underage individuals, were arrested as suspected perpetrators. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and inside a well in Colonia Revolucion. 1 fatality.

Around 18 September 2024 (as reported), in San Blas Atempa, Oaxaca, a man was killed and his body was found with his head decapitated and a message stuck to the head outside a high school Coboa. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered in two different locations (on Jesus Gonzalez Ortega and Poeta Jesus Diaz streets) inside a drum and the rest of the body in a house . A man was arrested. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 12 October 2024, in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz, there was an armed clash between three armed people and the municipal police after the armed men killed a person (coded separately). One armed man was injured. Three people were arrested.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 12 October 2024, in Xalapa-Enriquez, Veracruz, at least three armed men shot and killed a person around colonia Jacarandas. The perpetrators later clashed with the municipal police (coded separately). 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2024 (month of), in Ciudad Obregon, Sonora, a man was kidnapped by several armed people after he arrived to his house. He was later found alive and rescued on 28 November by the authorities in Colonia Hidalgo. Drugs and weapons were seized also.

On 12 October 2024, in Toluca de Lerdo, Mexico, two people (a man and a woman) abducted a vendor. The perpetrators were arrested around 27 November 2024 in Tijuana, Baja California. It is unknown whether the victims were found and released.

Around 15 October 2024 (end of month), near Oxchuc, Chiapas, the former Tzeltal (Mayan indigenous group) woman mayor of Oxchuc and former local deputy for the We Can Move Chiapas party was shot at by two armed individuals when she was in her vehicle on her way to a meeting in an unspecified community. According to the victim, who was unharmed, before the attack, she was told (it is not known by whom) that a vehicle verification was being carried out and that they were looking for her (it is not specified who) and that three armed individuals upon seeing her said that she was coming and began to shoot at the vehicle. There were no casualties.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Juarez, Chihuahua, at least two unidentified individuals abducted four Jordanian migrants. Around 26 November 2024, municipal police officers released the victims and arrested two armed underage men in a house in the intersection of Licenciado Benito Juarez and Jose Isabel Sanchez streets, in Colonia Campesina.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota
notes: On 18 September 2024, in Rafael Delgado, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals opened fire at two state police officers who were injured and transported to the hospital. 2 injuries.

On 22 October 2024, in Taxco de Alarcon, Guerrero, a journalist was assaulted by the security personnel of the municipal president during a religious cultural-musical event after the escort tried to snatch the work equipment, and carried out physical and verbal aggressions. There were no fatalities.
On 1 August 2024, in Chamilpa, Morelos, two armed individuals shot and three people. One man died and two were injured. The attack is being linked to the sale of drugs. 1 fatality, 2 injuries.

On 8 August 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, several armed men entered a bar and shot at the people in colonia Valle Dorado. One person was killed and two people were injured. 1 fatality, 2 injured.

Around 10 August 2024 (as reported), in San Luis Potosi state, members of the Grupo Bravo Gang kidnapped a member of Los Alemanes Cartel and interrogated him about the connection they have with the authorities. The event was recorded in video and shared on social media. The video shows the victim handcuffed and on his knees while three armed persons interrogate him. It is unknown what happened with the hostage. Casualties unknown.

On 15 August 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, two armed individuals arrived on a motorcycle opened fire at a woman and a minor in Colonia Aguaje 2000. Both were injured as a result. 2 injuries.
On 19 August 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, according to witnesses, armed men who arrived on a motorcycle shot and killed a man in colonia Simon Diaz. 1 fatality.

On 27 August 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals attacked the municipal police headquarters with explosives launched from drones. There were no injuries. The attacks are a series of roadblocks and drone attacks as part of the dispute between criminal groups (coded separately).

On 27 August 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Viagras gang and their allies CJNG attacked lemon cutters who managed to seek refuge in a warehouse. There were no casualties. These acts of violence were perpetrated by the criminal bloc a few hours after they announced their Viagras-CJNG alliance to fight together against the Mexican Army.
On 9 September 2024, near around Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, a landmine suspectedly planted by gang members exploded when a man on a horse passed-by, injuring him.

On 20 September 2024, in Los Tepetates, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

On 13 September 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan, a known lemon farmer and business man was killed in his farm. According to the police, the perpetrators are members of Los Vigaras Gang as he was a victim of extortion. The area is known for lemon production and the extortion by cartels. 1 fatality.
Around 12 September 2024 (as reported), in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, a woman was killed and the body was found inside a plastic bag in colonia El Aguaje. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 22 September 2024 (between 20 - 24 September), in San Juan Evangelista, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, two men were killed and their bodies were found with their hands tied and with a message next to the bodies on 24 September. One of the victims was identified as an official from Playa Vicente and director of the Economic Development of the Municipality together with his son. Both men were reported missing on 20 September. 2 fatalities.

On 25 September 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, several armed individuals shot at a van and a house in the intersection of Camino Real a Saltillo and Aztecas streets, in Colonia Imperio Azteca, injuring a person.

On 28 September 2024, in Chamilpa, Morelos, according to witnesses, two armed men shot and killed a woman who worked at a food stand near Cuernavaca-Tepoztlan road. The perpetrators fled on a motorbike. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2024, around Chamilpa, Morelos, armed men in a vehicle shot in a drive-by at the check-point of the National Guard on the Mexico-Cuernavaca. One police officer died after he was ran over. One armed man was arrested and two vehicles were seized. 1 fatality.

On 17 October 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, a group on individuals abducted three people (a man and two women). The Civil State Guard (GCE) and the State Commission for the Search for Persons (CEBP) released them near the community of Pozas de Santa Ana and 57 Matehuala-San Luis road.

On 19 October 2024, in San Luis Potosi, San Luis Potosi, a group of armed masked and hooded individuals entered restaurant 'La Revolucion' on Ignacio Comonfort street, in Colonia Alamitos, and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.

source: La Jornada; La Voz de Michoacan
notes: On 25 October 2024, in Buenavista Tomatlan, Michoacan de Ocampo, four men abducted and killed a taxi driver, whose body was found with signs of torture and with his ears mutilated and wrapped in sacks in a field next to the Apatzingan-Tepalcatepec highway near Ejido Benito Juarez. The perpetrators were the former leader and current members of Andres Quintana Roo Taxi Union, and suspectedly killed the victim for refusing a collaboration between the union and criminal organizations for the distribution of drugs. 1 fatality.
On 1 August 2024, in Izucar de Matamoros, Puebla, several armed individuals opened fire at a man and killed him while he was riding his motorcycle on the international highway to Oaxaca. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2024, in Tonala, Jalisco, armed individuals set fire to a house near the university and beat two elderly people and then fled the scene in two vehicles. The attack is being linked to a dispute over property. There were no fatalities.

On 5 August 2024, in Pueblo Nuevo, Sinaloa, armed individuals attack military officers who repelled the aggression. The armed individuals fled the scene and abandoned the vehicle they were traveling in together with tire spikes, tactical vests, chargers, cartridges and equipment. There were no fatalities.

On 5 August 2024, in Uriangato, Guanajuato, an armed group shot the facade of a hospital and then proceeded to enter and kidnap a patient. The man was killed and his body was found hours later dismembered at an intersection with a message next to the remains. 1 fatality.
Around 9 August 2024 (as reported), in Tonala, Jalisco, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied up in colonia Hacienda Real. 1 fatality.
On 19 August 2024, in Tonala, Jalisco, according to witnesses, three men beat up a man and killed him in Colonia Infonavit La Soledad. 1 fatality.
On 19 August 2024, in Dolores, Chihuahua, criminal rival groups engaged in an armed clash. There were no casualties.
On 26 August 2024, in Pueblo Viejo, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Viagras gang and Los Reyes engaged in armed clashes, shootings and drones attacks were reported. Casualties unknown.

On 27 August 2024, in El Cajoncito, Chihuahua, according to human rights groups, members of criminal groups linked to drug dealing attacked, threatened and displaced residents of the Raramuri indigenous community. This incident was replicated in other localities of the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

On 27 August 2024, in Guadalupe y Calvo municipality, Chihuahua, according to human rights groups, members of criminal groups linked to drug dealing attacked, threatened and displaced residents of the Raramuri indigenous community in El Silverio community. This incident was replicated in other localities of the municipality (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
On 16 September 2024, in Yuriria, Guanajuato, armed men in a van shot at people in the Main Garden of the community of Tinaja del Coyote, killing five and injuring two (drive-by). 5 fatalities.

On 19 September 2024, in Las Coloradas 2da seccion, Tabasco, unknown armed individuals shot and killed a man close to his home. The victim was identified as the husband of the current municipal delegate, the leader of a criminal gang and father of two of the three minors who were arrested for extortion and kidnapping. There was a message left next to the body. 1 fatality.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), in Guadalupe y Calvo, Chihuahua, an off-duty municipal police officer was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds in the head on a path that connects Llano Grande and the village of Milpillas. 1 fatality.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Salamanca, Guanajuato, three people were killed and their bodies were found in Colonia Cruz next to a banner with a message accursing the victims of supporting the CJNG. The perpetrators are suspected to be members of the Santa Rosa de Lima Cartel. 3 fatalities.

source: La Silla Rota; Milenio; Zona Franca
notes: On 1 October 2024, in Salamanca, Guanajuato, several armed men entered the facilities of a rehab center and shot and killed five people in Colonia El Rosario. Another four people were also injured. 5 fatalities. 4 injuries.

Around 2 October 2024 (as reported), in Guadalupe y Calvo, Chihuahua, five men were killed and their bodies were found with signs of violence in Las Crucecitas. Three of the men were wearing military style clothing, tactical vests and magazine pouches. 5 fatalities.
Around 14 October 2024 (as reported), in Tonala, Jalisco, a person was killed and the body was found decapitated and wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia La Loma. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in San Miguel de Allende, Guanajuato, armed men attacked a drug and alcohol rehabilitation center in Colonia San Martin and killed three individuals and injured two. This is the second attack on a rehab center in Guanajuato in October. 3 fatalities, 2 injuries.

On 24 October 2024, in Santo Domingo Teojomulco, Oaxaca, unknown armed individuals shot at the municipal president who was accompanied by police officers during an operation against illegal animal hunt. The officers answered the attack, while the mayor was injured along with two collaborators. One armed individual was killed. 1 fatality, 3 injuries.

On 13 October 2024, in Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, according to witnesses, two men armed with a baseball bat hit and killed a man on 43 street, in Colonia Villas de Carrizalejo. The perpetrators were arrested on 10 January 2025 in the same colonia. 1 fatality.

On 14 August 2024, in Atencingo, Puebla, hooded armed individuals who arrived on several motorcycles opened fire at two men and one woman in Colonia La Cruz. All three were injured as a result. It is being investigated whether the attack is related to a settling of scores. 3 injuries.

On 25 August 2024, in Atencingo, Puebla, armed individuals opened fire from their motorcycle and shot a man driving in his car (drive-by). The man was injured and transported to the hospital. 1 injury.
On 20 October 2024, in Tlalpujahua de Rayon, Michoacan de Ocampo, an off-duty police officer was shot and killed on Calzada del Carmen street. 1 fatality.
On 13 October 2024, near Ciudad Rio Bravo, Tamaulipas, unidentified individuals used a drone to launch explosives and killed a state police officer in Brecha 109. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
source: Imagen del Golfo; La Silla Rota
notes: Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Chocaman, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a woman was killed and her naked body was found with a gunshot wound, the hands tied, and wrapped in a blanket on a road that connects to San Jose Neria. 1 fatality.
On 2 August 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed individuals opened fire from a car (drive-by) and shot a man driving in his car in fraccionamiento Urbi Villas del Real. One man was injured. 1 injury.

On 17 August 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, two armed individuals opened fire at a man and a woman at Plaza Las Gaviotas in the tourist area of the city. The man died and the woman was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.
On 18 August 2024, in Coquimatlan, Colima, armed individuals shot and killed a man and fled the scene close to City Hall. 1 fatality.
Around 26 August 2024 (as reported), close to Teneria Del Santuario, Guanajuato, two people were killed and their bodies were found dismembered and with a message next to the bodies. 2 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Mexico; La Jornada; Milenio; Zona Franca
notes: On 11 September 2024, in Empalme Escobedo, Guanajuato, the future director of Tourism of the administration (2024-2027) of the Morena party was shot and killed by a group of armed men who entered the 'Cremeria Clarita' business and shot him. The victim was the owner of the business and former director of Transit for the government (2009-2012). According to authorities, the perpetrators are suspected to be members of the Santa Rosa de Lima Cartel, who are attacking close collaborators from mayors, however, this was not confirmed. 1 fatality.
Around 10 September 2024 (as reported), in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, a person was killed and his/her body was found wrapped in an unspecified material on Delfin avenue. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, several unknown armed men intercepted an off-duty municipal commander and former deputy chief while he was driving a truck and shot him near fraccionamiento Los Mangos. 1 fatality.
On 22 September 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed men abducted a man in a rehabilitation center in Colonia Emiliano Zapata (likely witness were present). The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 26 September 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed men got off at least two vans and abducted a man who was parking his car. The victim is a digital platforms' driver.
On 26 September 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed individuals abducted an off-duty police officer in front of a bar in Zona Dorada. The victim was later released.
On 29 September 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed men on vans abducted two persons. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.
On 1 October 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed two men in a drive-by shooting. The victims were in a play room in Colonia Rafael Buelna. 2 fatalities.

Around 6 October 2024 (between 4 - 8 October), in the 'Sinaloense' tunnel on Durango-Mazatlan road (coded to Mazatlan), Sinaloa, a video was published on social media on the 8 October showing armed individuals using trailers to set up a (narco) blockade in the tunnel on the Durango-Mazatlan highway. It is suspected that the incident occurred after a clash between armed groups in which an unspecified number of people were killed. Some media indicate that the event happened on the same day the video was published, while others say it corresponds to an event that occurred on 4 October. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.
Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, two armed men who arrived on a motorbike shot and killed a man on Kena Moreno street. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, between four and five armed individuals kidnapped three men and a woman from a home in Colonia Telleria while they were on vacation. The whereabouts of the individuals remain unknown.

On 23 October 2024, close to Mazatlan, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals intercepted a truck driver and kidnapped the co-pilot on the Mazatlan-Culiacan highway. The whereabouts of the man remain unknown.

Around 19 October 2024 (month of), in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his beheaded body was found in a state of decomposition in Ejido El Venadillo, in Sector Salud de Badiraguato. There was a birth certificate next to the body, although it is unknown whether it belongs to the victim. The body was found after an anonymous call indicated its location. 1 fatality.
On 20 October 2024, in Mazatlan, Sinaloa, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man (drive-by) on Avenida Francisco Solis. 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2024 (month of), in La Paz, Baja California, members of the Group of Tactical Operations of the state police and navy officers hit and injured an unspecified number of arrested drug dealers during an operation in Colonia Valle del Mezquite. Unspecified number of injured.
Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Encarnacion de Diaz, Jalisco, unidentified gangs clashed. Two men died and another was injured. 2 fatalities, 1 injured.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, two men abducted three people of Colombian nationality (a man, a woman, and a child), got them on a bus, and forced the drivers to drive towards Monterrey. Civil Force officers arrested the men and released the victims on Monterrey-Nuevo Laredo road, in the municipality of Sabinas Hidalgo, Nuevo Leon.

On 17 August 2024, in Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, members of the CDN part of Los Chukys group traveling in more than 15 trucks opened fire at the military force. Between four to two men died, including a soldier. Another five people were also injured. At least 2 fatalities.

On 19 September 2024, in La Estanzuela, Jalisco, members of the Jalisco New Generation Cartel (CJNG) opened fire at elements of the National Guard on patrol who repelled the aggression. Officers arrested ten people and released two men who were kidnapped. One person was found dead at the site (no information on the circumstances). Officers seized several vehicles, weapons, magazines and drugs. There were no casualties.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); El Proceso; Imagen del Golfo; La Verdad; Milenio; Quadratin Oaxaca
notes: On 4 October 2024, in Maria Lombardo de Caso, Oaxaca, at least two men abducted a woman Mixe Indigenous activist and lawyer and her husband. The woman had denounced state and federal police officers who shared intimate images of Indigenous women in chats. An arrest operation against the suspected perpetrators led to an armed clash near Palomares around 29 January 2025 (coded separately). Another woman suspect was arrested in the municipality of Santiago Yaveo around 3 February 2025. The victims' whereabouts are unknown.

source: Diario Via Libre; La Silla Rota; Milenio; News Hidalgo
notes: Around 10 August 2024 (as reported), in Mineral de la Reforma, Hidalgo, a man was killed and the body was found with some parts cut off and inside a suitcase in Colonias Las Aguilas. 1 fatality.

Around 24 September 2024 (as reported), in the municipality of Mineral de la Reforma, Hidalgo, a woman was killed and her body was found tied and with her mouth covered in tape between El Saucillo and La Providencia. 1 fatality.

On 3 October 2024, in Canada del Agua, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals opened fire at officers of the National Guard who repelled the aggression. One man was hit by a stray bullet and died as a result. 1 fatality.

source: El Siglo de Durango; Zona Franca
notes: On 8 October 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, according to witnesses, a group of armed men entered a mechanic workshop on Norte 9 street, in Ciudad Industrial, and shot and killed four men, among whom there were employees. 4 fatalities.

On 2 September 2024, close to Empalme Escobedo, Guanajuato, armed men opened fire at the vehicle transporting the son of the elected mayor. The victim was injured and the driver was killed as a result. On 22 September, the authorities arrested one man who participated in the event. The detainee is also said to have participated in the killings of the former director of Traffic of Comonfort and virtual director of Tourism, Tomas Mata; and the former mayor of Comonfort and future secretary of the City Council. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

source: Diario Contra Poder en Chiapas; La Jornada; Milenio
notes: On 11 September 2024, in Xochiltepec, Puebla, unidentified armed individuals killed the elected mayor outside his house around El Aguaje. The victim was the former candidate of the Force for Mexico Party (FXM). The victim would take office on October 15, replacing the Mayor. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2024, in Jerez de Garcia Salinas, Zacatecas, members of the CJNG aboard several vehicles placed a narco banner at the front of the municipal presidency and when they left, they threw fragmentation grenades towards the municipal presidency which injured five people. Another version is that the CJNG threw the grenades and shot directly at taxi drivers at the municipal presidency leading to 5 injuries. Three taxis were damaged. 5 injuries.
On 1 August 2024, in Tizayuca, Hidalgo, two men on a motorcycle opened fire at the facade of a home in Colonia Nacozari (drive-by). Two people were injured as a result. 2 injuries.
On 6 August 2024, in El Bejuco, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals shot and killed and off-duty state police officer. 1 fatality.

On 8 August 2024, in Tizayuca, Hidalgo, according to witnesses, armed individuals travelling in two vehicles shot and killed a woman who was driving in a drive-by in colonia Rancho Don Antonio. 1 fatality.

On 13 August 2024, in Tecamachalco, Puebla, armed individuals opened fire at the National Guard who repelled the aggression on the Puebla-Tehuacan highway. Two men were arrested and one was injured. 1 injury.

On 26 August 2024, in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, unknown armed individuals threw an explosive device inside a backpack at the home of the brother of the former councilor and leader of the National Union of Workers March 25 causing damage to the building and damaging a truck and two injuries to employees. The leader accused the Libertad Union of the attack. 2 injuries.

On 3 September 2024, around Santa Rita Tlahuapan, Puebla, armed individuals shot and killed a woman who was driving on Mexico-Puebla highway. The vehicle crashed. The victim was the president of the municipal branch of the National System for the Integral Development of the Family (DIF) in Calpan. The victim was also the wife of the mayor of Calpan, of Citizens' Movement party, who she had conflicts with. 1 fatality.

On 12 September 2024, in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, there was an armed clash between criminal members over the dispute of the territory in Colonia Fuentes de Aragon. One man was killed. Later, three people who were the perpetrators were beaten up by the rival group and later arrested by the police. 1 fatality.

On 16 September 2024, in Tizayuca, Hidalgo, three men on two motorbikes shot and injured a former military officer in front of his house in Fraccionamiento San Angel (drive-by). According to witnesses, the victim had previously held an argument with the perpetrators.
On 14 September 2024, in Patzcuaro, Michoacan, there was an armed clash between the state police and armed men in Colonia Juventino Rosas. Two police officers were injured.

Around 24 September 2024 (as reported), in San Francisco Coacalco, Mexico, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic bags in an abandoned car in Colonia Bosques del Valle. 1 fatality.
Around 25 September 2024 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a man was killed and his remains were found inside a suitcase in Colonia Santo Tomas Chiconautla. 1 fatality.

On 27 September 2024, in Nopala, Hidalgo, army and state police officers clashed with an armed group of huachicoleros (fuel thieves) during an operations against theft of fuel in Dentho. Two huachicoleros were killed, three arrested, and two officers injured. 2 fatalities.

Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in Nopala de Villagran, Hidalgo, army and National Guard officers clashed with armed individuals. Five people were injured (four officers and an armed individual). The officers seized drugs and fuel.
Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found in Colonia Mesa de Leones. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.
Around 10 October 2024 (as reported), in Tizayuca, Hidalgo, a woman was killed and her body was found with signs of torture in colonia San Juan Huicalco. 1 fatality.

Around 5 October 2024 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds to his body and with a message next to him in Colonia Mesa de Leones. 1 fatality.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with a cut on the throat and inside a plastic bag under a trailer on Rio de los Remedios avenue, in the junction with General Cristobal Solano street, in Colonia Granjas Valle de Guadalupe. 1 fatality.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in the municipality of Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, two people (one of them a man) were killed and their bodies were found inside plastic bags on Mexico-Pachuca road. 2 fatalities.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with knife wounds and the hands tied on Puerto Morazan street, near Las Torres avenue, in Colonia Tierra Blanca. 1 fatality.

On 8 October 2024, in San Francisco Tlaloc, Puebla, army officers and suspected armed huachicoleros (fuel thieves) clashed when the latter shot at the officers that were conducting a routine surveillance operation. Two army officers were injured.
Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered and wrapped in bags on the Lecheria-Texcoco road. 1 fatality.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), in Licenciado Benito Juarez, Sinaloa, two men were killed and their bodies were found shot to death with signs of torture and covered in a tarp in Villa Juarez. 2 fatalities.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Ecatepec de Morelos, Mexico, a person was killed and the body was found with stab wounds and the hands tied on a field near La Preciosa street, in Colonia Pirules de Ballisco. 1 fatality.

source: La Prensa de Monclova; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; MiMorelia
notes: On 24 August 2024, in Salsipuedes, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals suspectedly linked to Jalisco New Generation Cartel and armed individuals from Ojo de Agua, El Ranchito, Zapotan and Morelia suspectedly linked to an unidentified Policia Comunitaria or to a criminal group known as 'El Comandante Teto', clashed in the community of Salsipuedes, close to Los Callejones and 500 m. from the border with the state of Colima, resulting in at least eight dead, five injured, and six people missing. The army later deployed officers in the area. On 29 August a man was found dead in the same area and it is suspected that the victim died in the clash. Around 20 February 2025, a man was arrested for this event. At least 9 fatalities.
Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in San Salvador el Seco, Puebla, a person was killed and the body was found dismembered in El Carril de los Alamos. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2024, in Cancun, Quintana Roo, armed men abducted and on the same day killed a member of the Andres Quintana Roo Taxi Union and his body was found next to Cancun-Merida road. Nine men were arrested, including the union's secretary for suspectedly having ordered the killing. A search in the union's premises on 6 November 2024 led to the seizure of drugs and the location of a torture room. 1 fatality.

location: Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero
notes: Around 15 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad de Mexico - Gustavo A. Madero, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in a sheet and tied in Colonia San Felipe de Jesus. 1 fatality.

On 24 October 2024, in Huamuxtitlan, Guerrero, a group of several armed men intercepted the former Morena mayor, kidnapped him and killed his driver. The former mayor was found dead the same day. 2 fatalities.

source: Diario de Morelos; El Norte; La Jornada; La Prensa de Monclova; La Silla Rota; Milenio
notes: On 24 October 2024, in Tecpan de Galeana, Guerrero, members of Guerrero New Generation aboard at least 20 trucks engaged in an armed clash with Los Granados gang on a road that leads to El Moreno. Municipal police officers on duty were involved in the attack resulting in the death of two municipal police officers. The military also came under attack and received support from elements of the National Guard. Three military officers were injured as a result. 17 armed individuals died. It is believed that one of the rival gangs have links with the CJNG. Over 100 gang members had entered the municipality the same day and were being searched by military and police officers. Police and military seized 16 vehicles, weapons, cartridges and explosive devices. 11 armed individuals were arrested. 19 fatalities.

On 1 September 2024, in Guadalajara, Jalisco, three men got off a vehicle and shot at four children in a store in Colonia Heliodoro Hernandez Loza, killing three minors (including a 2-years old girl) and injuring a fourth child and a man. 3 fatalities, 2 injured.
Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), in Amozoc de Mota, Puebla, two men were killed and their bodies were found dismembered inside plastic bags in Colonia San Jose Las Flores. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 16 October 2024, in Cosamaloapan, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, according to witnesses, armed men on a vehicle shot at a vehicle, killing a man and injuring his underage daughter (drive-by) on Adolfo Ruiz Cortines y Morelos street. An alternative version indicates that his daughter remained uninjured. The man was a former police officer. 1 fatality.

On 15 October 2024, in Celaya, Guanajuato, for a second consecutive day, armed men entered the vehicle verification center and opened fire at employees, killing two people and injuring one. 2 fatalities, 1 injury.

On 15 October 2024, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, several unknown armed men opened fire and killed three men inside a bar in Colonia Santa Julia. One of the men was an 18 year old waiter who was shot in the head. 3 fatalities.

On 19 October 2024, in Irapuato, Guanajuato, unidentified men entered a house in the intersection of Santander and Matogrosso streets, in Colonia Las Americas, and attempted to abduct a man. His mother, who was in the house, hit the men to try to prevent the abduction. The men then shot and killed the man and the woman. The perpetrators fled aboard two vans. 2 fatalities.

On 20 October 2024, in Tonala, Jalisco, unidentified individuals shot and killed a man, and his body was found hours later wrapped in plastic in the intersection of Trincheras and Vicente Guerrero streets, in Colonia Altamira. 1 fatality.
On 16 October 2024, in Zapopan, Jalisco, several armed individuals arrived at a family party in Colonia Santa Margarita and opened fire at a man who died as a result. 1 fatality.

On 13 October 2024, in Chimalhuacan, Puebla, armed men entered a grocery store and opened fire at customers inside and outside the grocery store. One man threw a bottle at the armed men in an attempt to prevent the attack. Two men died as a result and one person was injured. Four children, who were inside the store were not injured. 2 fatalities.

On 16 October 2024, in Guadalupe, Zacatecas, officers of the military and municipal police were carrying out an arrest when they were shot at by armed individuals and repelled the aggression in Colonia Las Americas. Three men were arrested, including one minor, accused of being members of the CDN. Police officers seized weapons, drugs and homemade explosives.

On 18 October 2024, in the municipality of Cienega de Flores, Nuevo Leon, state police officers and unidentified gang members clashed on Cienagade Flores-Salinas Victoria road, by Colonia Real del Sol. Three armed individuals died and five officers were injured. 3 fatalities, 5 injured.

On 18 October 2024, in Tepeojuma, Puebla, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot at three members of a family who were refueling at a Pemex gas station, killing two (a man and his underage son) and injuring a woman (their wife and mother). An employee of the station was collaterally injured. The attack was suspectedly linked to drug deals and targeted the two dead men, who were members of a gang led by someone known as 'El Medina'. 2 fatalities, 2 injured.

source: El Proceso; La Voz de Michoacan
notes: Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in the bordering area between Michoacan and Colima (coded to Coahuayana de Hidalgo), Michoacan de Ocampo, a landmine exploded and injured four members of the Coahuayana de Hidalgo Communal Militia (Mexico) that travelled in a van. Other members of the militia later found three other mines in the area.

Around 23 October 2024 (as reported), in Canton San Luis, Chiapas, a person was killed and the human remains were found dismembered inside plastic bags including one bag with the limbs and legs and the other bag with the rest of the body. 1 fatality.

On 14 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Coyoacan, several people attacked officers of the Secretariat of Citizen Security (SSC) while they were conducting security patrols and observed two people exchanging money and bags in Colonia Emiliano Zapata. When officers attempted to arrest both people as suspected drug dealers, three other individuals arrived to prevent the arrest, beating the officers. Police officers ended up arresting five people and seizing drugs.

On 17 October 2024, in the municipality of Progreso, Coahuila de Zaragoza, unidentified individuals shot at officers of the State Attorney General's office, the Agency of Criminal Investigations (AIC) and the Action and Reaction Police (PAR). The officers repelled the attack, killed three men and seized three fireweapons. 3 fatalities.

On 14 September 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Alvaro Obregon, according to witnesses, a man and a woman shot and killed a man on Privada del Rodeio street, in Colonia El Rodeo. The perpetrators were arrested and the authorities seized drugs. 1 fatality.
On 8 October 2024, in Carmen, Nuevo Leon, three armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Hacienda El Jaral. The three perpetrators were arrested around March 2025. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, in Manzanillo, Colima, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a woman in a drive-by shooting on Avenida Elias Zamora Verduzco. The woman was an employee of the Attorney General's Office (FGR). 1 fatality.
On 12 October 2024, in Cuajinicuilapa, Guerrero, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed (drive-by) two men at a taxi station. One of the victims was a taxi union leader and his brother. 2 fatalities.
On 12 October 2024, in Ciudad Apodaca, Nuevo Leon, unidentified armed men shot and injured a ministerial police officer in colonia Pueblo Nuevo.

On 10 October 2024, in San Luis Rio Colorado, Sonora, there was an armed clash between criminal groups in colonia Comercial. Two men were kidnapped. They were killed and the same day their bodies were found burned inside a vehicle in Colonia Burocrata. Later, six people were arrested. 2 fatalities.

On 14 October 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, unidentified individuals who arrived in a van shot at people at Las Cruces taxi stand, killing two men (including a taxi driver) and injuring four people. Also in Acapulco, according to witnesses, unidentified individuals shot and killed a taxi driver who had just left his house in El Cuetero. 3 fatalities, 4 injured.
On 11 October 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and injured (drive-by) a man and his son in fraccionamiento Hornos. 2 injured.

Around 11 October 2024 (as reported), in Cuajinicuilapa, Guerrero, a man was killed and beheaded. The body and the head were thrown. Relatives of the victim pick up the body and take it away. 1 fatality.
On 9 September 2024, in Tlaquepaque, Jalisco, several individuals stabbed and beat up a man around colonia Lomas del Cuatro. He was left injured.

On 10 October 2024, between General Bravo and Tamaulipas state, Nuevo Leon, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and the state police that started in Tamaulipas and ended in General Bravo. Three armed men were killed. 3 fatalities.
Around 10 October 2024 (as reported), in Tepexco, Puebla, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and gunshot wounds on the Izucar de Matamoros - Cuautla. 1 fatality.

On 28 July 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, unidentified armed individuals shot and killed a transit municipal police officer when he was eating at a restaurant in Pie de la Cuesta (likely off-duty). A woman that was with him was also injured. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Sol de Acapulco
notes: On 1 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, four men on two motorcycles opened fire at one man and one boy inside a car wash in Colonia Centro and then fled the scene (drive-by). Both men were injured as a result.
Around 1 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found dismembered. 1 fatality.
On 3 August 2024, in San Juan Tuxco, Puebla, two armed men arrived at a car wash and shot and killed a man. 1 fatality.
Around 6 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the decapitated head was found on top of a taxi in Infonavit Alta Progreso. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 6 August 2024 (between 5 - 6 August), in Papantla de Olarte, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed individuals attacked municipal police officers and launched at least one grenade at the police officers, which did not explode. There were no injuries.

Around 10 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, three people were killed and their bodies were found in a vehicle in colonia Vista Alegre. One of the victims was only the head that was found. 3 fatalities.

Around 11 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, an person was killed and only the head was found behind a taxi on Avenida Constituyentes. State authorities arrested two people who threw human remains inside the vehicle. 1 fatality.

Around 12 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, an unknown number of people were killed and the human remains were found inside bags in colonia Progreso. Unspecified number of fatalities coded as 3.
On 13 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed rival groups engaged in an armed clash in Colonia El Palmar leading to the death of one man. 1 fatality.

source: El Sol de Acapulco; El Sur de Acapulco
notes: On 13 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, about 15 armed men threw a grenade and shot at a house (likely not empty) and set it on fire and then shot at it in Colonia Palmar. There were no casualties.

Around 13 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a 17 year old woman was killed and her body was found mutilated in the back of a truck in Colonia La Venta. The girl was a missing person. 1 fatality.

Around 14 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied in Colonia Fidel Velazquez. The same day, three dismembered people were killed and their bodies were found inside a van in La Venta. 4 fatalities.

On 14 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals launched an explosive device at the headquarters of the state police close to the prison Las Cruces. There were no injuries.

On 19 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, at least three armed men kidnapped a minor in Colonia Centro and then fled the scene. Police officers intercepted the men and managed to arrest two men while a third man escaped the scene with the minor. The victim's whereabouts remain unknown.

Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in plastic around bulevar Lazaro Cardenas on the road from Cayaco to Las Cruces. 1 fatality.
On 20 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, a man was shot and killed by armed men in La Laja market. The relatives took the body. 1 fatality.

Around 16 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture, his hands and feet tied and with a torniquet around his neck in Colonia Benito Juarez on the Mexico-Acapulco highway. 1 fatality.

On 17 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed individuals opened fire from a moving car in Joyas del Marques at four people in a vehicle (drive-by). One man died and three were injured as a result. 1 fatality, 3 injuries.
Around 18 August 2024 (as reported), in Caimanero, Sinaloa, a person was killed and human remains were found inside a burned car. 1 fatality.
Around 19 August 2024 (as reported), in Guasave, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found burned near the Sinaloa river. 1 fatality.

source: El Norte; El Sol de Acapulco; Milenio
notes: Around 20 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the human head was found outside a cooler on Miguel Aleman. 1 fatality.

Around 21 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with his feet and hands tied up in colonia Sinai. Also in Acapulco, a man was killed and his beheaded body was found with signs of torture in black plastic bags in the trunk of a taxi on Escenica Clemente Mejia Avila avenue, under a bridge connecting Cumbres de Llano Largo to Loyola University. 2 fatalities.

On 22 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot at a public van on Mexico-Acapulco road near La Garita, killing a man who was in the van (drive-by). 1 fatality.

On 23 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, an armed individual shot a traffic police officer who stopped him in a vehicle checkpoint in Colonia Progreso. The officers reported that an unknown number of people were injured.
On 25 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed individuals shot and killed an off-duty police officer who was driving on Cuauhtemoc avenue. 1 fatality.
On 26 August 2024, in Salvatierra, Guanajuato, several armed men arrived at a grocery store in Colonia San Juan and opened fire at a group of people. Four men were killed as a result. 4 fatalities.

Around 28 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his handcuffed and blindfolded body was found in Colonia Chinameca. Also, another man was killed and his body was found tied by hands and feet, with signs of torture in Fraccioanmiento Libertadores. The body was found wrapped from the waist up with a blanket along with a message. Also in Acapulco de Juarez, two men were killed and their bodies were found tied by their hands and feet in Colonia La Cima. 4 fatalities.

On 28 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, armed individuals shot and killed a man as he was dropping off his daughter at school in Colonia Bellavista. The victim was an employee of the Conservation department of the Mexican Social Security Institute (IMSS) at the Vicente Guerrero hospital. The motive for the attack is unknown. 1 fatality.
On 28 August 2024, in Tenencia Morelos, Michoacan, armed men in a vehicle shot and injured a woman on Cuitzillo street (drive-by). 1 injured.

Around 31 August 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back and with signs of torture in Colonia Cayaco. Hours earlier, another man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and with his hands and feet tied and a torniquet around his neck in Colonia Chinameca. 2 fatalities.

On 31 August 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses armed men entered a funeral home and opened fire at those present in Colonia Progreso. An unknown number of individuals were injured.
Around 1 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags in Colonia Alborada. 1 fatality.

Around 2 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands and feet tied and with signs of torture in Colonia Apolonio Castillo. 1 fatality.

Around 3 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found beaten up, semi-naked and with his feet and hands tied up in colonia Vicente Guerrero. 1 fatality.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with a tourniquet around the neck and the hands tied on Pico de Orizaba street, in Colonia Cumbres de Figueroa. Also, two men were killed and their bodies were found with the hands and feet tied between Oaxaca street and Baja California avenue, in Colonia Progreso. Also in Acapulco, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found in several plastic bags in a van on Nicolas Bravo street, Pozo de la Nacion neighborhood, Colonia Centro. The van had gunshots on the co-pilot door. 4 fatalities.

Around 5 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a woman was killed and her body was found with a tourniquet around the neck and signs of torture in Colonia Libertadores. 1 fatality.

On 10 September 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, three armed men shot at taxi drivers in front of the DIF offices on Victoria street, a few meters from Adolfo Ruiz Cortines avenue, in Colonia La Laja, injuring one of the drivers. The victim was transferred to a hospital. 1 injured.
Around 13 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the human remains were found inside bags in Colonia Juan R. Escudero. 1 fatality.

Around 15 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands tied up, signs of torture and a tourniquet in Fraccionamiento Farallon. 1 fatality.
On 17 September 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed individuals shot at a taxi on Mexico-Acapulco federal road, direction Cima-Cruces, injuring the driver. The passengers were not injured.
Around 18 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a teenager was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back in Colonia Postal. 1 fatality.

On 19 September 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two armed men in a car opened fire at municipal police officers in the center of the city leading to a chase. The armed men fled the scene after abandoning the car. One civilian was killed, one police officer was injured and two vehicles were damaged in the attack. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

Around 19 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his dismembered body was found inside three plastic bags with signs of torture in Colonia Progreso. 1 fatality.

Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture in La Poza. The man was identified as a missing person since 8 September. 1 fatality.

Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and the body was found with a tourniquet wrapped in a tarp on the Mexico- Acapulco road around Colonia Benito Juarez and Colonia Libertad. 1 fatality.
Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and the body was found with a tourniquet inside a vehicle around Distrito de Galeana. 1 fatality.
Around 29 September 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and their remains were found inside plastic bags on bulevar Vicente Guerrero. 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the human remains were found inside black plastic bags inside a metal tub on Costera Miguel Aleman Avenue in Fraccionamiento Magallanes. 1 fatality.

On 30 September 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed individuals in a vehicle shot and killed a taxi driver in a drive-by on the Mexico-Acapulco highway around Colonia 20 de noviembre. 1 fatality.

Around 1 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and the body was found with his hands and feet tied up with a tourniquet around his neck in Colonia Morelos. 1 fatality.
