Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, four men were killed and two bodies were found dismembered at an intersection of Colonia San Miguel in the direction of El Pitayo and two more on the federal highway. The two dismembered men were removed by family members, according to witnesses. Also in Acapulco, a man was killed and his body was found with a torniquet around his neck, his hands and feet tied and with signs of torture in Colonia El Progreso. 5 fatalities.

Around 30 September 2024 (between 30 September - 3 October), in San Martin Texmelucan de Labastida, Puebla, a man was killed and his decapitated body was found inside a car outside a Walmart store. An unspecified threatening message was found next to the body. The victim was a business man who had been abducted by members of La Barredora Gang on 30 September 2024, and his body was found on 3 October 2024. A video on social media showed the victim alive, semi-naked and with signs of torture. In the video, the victim tells people involved in 'huachicoleo' (fuel theft), drug dealing and extortion to 'stay away from San Martin'. 1 fatality.

Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two men were killed and their bodies were found with a torniquet around their necks, their hands tied and with signs of torture in Colonia Bellavista. 2 fatalities.

On 28 September 2024, in Pueblo Nuevo, Sinaloa, rival armed groups clashed on the highway known as 'Maxipista Culiacan-Mazatla'. Several other related clashes were recorded on the same day in other communities along this road (coded separately). Three bodies were found in Pueblo Nuevo while a the body of a fourth man was found along the Maxipista Culiacan - Mazatlan who suspectedly was involved in these clashes. This event is likely related to the ongoing fight between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel that started on 9 September (coded separately). 4 fatalities.

Around 4 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the human remains were abandoned by several armed individuals inside three bags in Colonia La Sabana. 1 fatality.

Around 7 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a person was killed and the body was found with signs of torture and wrapped in sheets in Colonia Ciudad Renacimiento. 1 fatality.

Around 8 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was thrown from a vehicle and found with signs of torture and the hands tied between 20 de Noviembre and Francisco Gonzalez Bocanegra streets, in Colonia Libertad. 1 fatality.
On 8 October 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, according to witnesses, armed men shot and killed a woman in an area known as 'Derrumbe', in Calzada Pie de la Cuesta, in the port. 1 fatality.

On 9 October 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot at people at a taxi stop located between Constituyentes avenue and 17 de Septiembre street, in Colonia Centro, injuring a taxi driver and a woman (drive-by).
On 15 October 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, armed individuals chased a person and opened fire from a moving motorcycle in Colonia Las Parotas killing the victim. 1 fatality.

Around 15 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, one person was killed and the human remains were found inside plastic bags inside a drum in Ciudad Renacimiento. A message was found next to the remains. 1 fatality.

Around 16 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two people were killed and their human remains were found inside a vehicle that was set on fire in Colonia Libertadores. 2 fatalities.

On 19 October 2024, in Uruapilla, Michoacan de Ocampo, an armed group shot and killed an off-duty state police officer who was driving on Morelia-Patzcuaro road. The victim was the chief of the escort of the municipal president of Huiramba, Michoacan. 1 fatality.

On 21 October 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, there was an armed clash between the state police and armed individuals in Colonia Emiliano Zapata. One officer was killed and another two people were arrested. 1 fatality.

On 19 October 2024, in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, two armed individuals on a car shot and killed a man on Velazquez de Leon street, in an area known as 'Tamarindo', in Colonia Centro (drive-by). 1 fatality.

Around 21 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed and his body was found with a tourniquet around his neck, tied up hands and feet, and with visible signs of torture in Colonia La Libertad. 1 fatality.

Around 22 October 2024 (as reported), in Jilotepec de Molina Enriquez, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with a shot to his head, tied, and with a message next to the body in San Pablo Huantepec. 1 fatality.

Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Acapulco de Juarez, Guerrero, a man was killed by at least four individuals (three men and one woman who was a preventive police officer) and his body was found. The victim was a veterinarian abducted in Fraccionamiento Costa Azu and the perpetrators had demanded a ramson for his family. The perpetrators were arrested on 10 January 2025. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2024, around Las Trancas, Nuevo Leon, military officers clashed with Huachicoleros (fuel thieves) during a patrol around the San Juan-Las Trancas road near General Teran. Two armed men were killed and another three were injured. 2 fatalities.

source: AFN - Tijuana; El Sol de Sinaloa
notes: On 12 September 2024, in Las Tapias, Sinaloa, the former municipal police commander was shot and killed in his house by unidentified armed individuals. The victim had been offered the position of Deputy Director of the corporation in 2022, after a commander was assassinated, but he rejected the position. 1 fatality.

On 13 September 2024, in Monte Verde de Villa, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between the National Guard and armed individuals during a police patrol. Long weapons, a grenade launcher, magazines and live cartridges were seized. There were no casualties.

Around 26 September 2024 (as reported), near El Melon, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with the hands tied behind his back on a side of Mazatlan-Culiacan highway, down the bridge that connects Loma de Redo and El Melon. 1 fatality.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Silla Rota; Riodoce
notes: Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Sanalona, Sinaloa, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds and signs of torture on a side of the road that leads to the town of Arroyo Grande and Espinar across Tamazula-Durango road. The body of the man was semi-naked. 2 fatalities.

Around 26 October 2024 (as reported), in Sanalona, Sinaloa, a person was killed and the body was found wrapped in a tarp at the El Carrizalejo police station. A video was released and it is suspected that the man in the video is a member of La Chapiza where he is interrogated. 1 fatality.

Around 13 September 2024 (as reported), in Santiago Cuautlalpan, Morelos, five people were killed and their bodies were found with gunshot wounds. The victims were tied hand and foot and had their throats slit. Next to the bodies there was a message signed by 'Pueblo Unido' accusing the victims of being kidnappers and rats. 5 fatalities.

On 30 July 2024, in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan, armed individuals shot at the state police, the national guard, and military officers on the Apatzingan-Aguililla road around glorieta to Chandio. There was a car chase. The armed individuals clashed around Colonia Lazaro Cardenas. One armed man was killed and another one was arrested. A police officer was injured after he was ran over. Another man who was a passer-by was also injured with a stray bullet. 1 fatality.

On 5 August 2024, in Ciudad Lopez Mateos, Mexico, unknown armed individuals shot and killed two men at a stop light in Colonia Lomas de Monte Maria. According to police, the victims were involved in drug dealing and it is suspected that the event was a settling of scores. 2 fatalities.

On 9 August 2024, in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, there was an armed clash between armed individuals and the state police around Novelistas de Ciudad Satelite. Five armed individuals were arrested. Two were injured. The incident was sparked after the armed men asked a person for money and the police intervened. 2 injured.
On 11 August 2024, in Ciudad Lopez Mateos, Mexico, according to witnesses, armed men shot at a group of friends who were drinking in colonia Emiliano Zapata. Two people were killed. 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 13 August 2024, in Boca del Rio, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, armed men attacked (methods unknown) a man and a woman at a shopping center and kidnapped the man. While the armed men were trying to kidnap the woman, the National Guard arrived, and according to witnesses, shots were fired. The perpetrators fled the scene in two pickup trucks. The whereabouts of the man remains unknown. Casualties unknown.

source: El Norte; La Jornada; La Silla Rota; Mural
notes: On 20 August 2024, in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, two unidentified armed individuals on a motorcycle shot and killed five men in Colonia San Esteban. One person was also injured. According to the investigations, at least one of the victims was a drug dealer and near the area there is a drug dealing point. A local source indicated that the Cartel Nuevo Imperio was involved. 5 fatalities.

source: Infobae; La Jornada; La Silla Rota
notes: On 29 August 2024, in Paredones, Sinaloa, military officers clashed with members of the Sinaloa Cartel. Some reports suggested that the arrested leader is one of the son of El Chapo who leads the Los Chapitos faction, though this was later denied by the authorities. Roadblocks were reported in several areas (coded separately). Two officers were injured.

Around 29 August 2024 (as reported), in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found naked, with a mutilated ear and with the hands tied in colonia San Antonio Zomeyucan. The body was left by suspects who were travelling in two vehicles. 1 fatality.
Around 2 September 2024 (as reported), in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, a man was killed and his decapitated head was found in a soccer field in Colonia Ampliacion Molinito. 1 fatality.

On 7 September 2024, in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, armed individuals intercepted a man and opened fire from their vehicle (drive-by) in Colonia San Antonio Zomeyucan. The man died as a result. 1 fatality.

Around 7 September 2024 (month of), in the municipality of Apatzingan, Michoacan de Ocampo (coded to Apatzingan de la Constitucion), a man was killed and his body was found tied, wrapped in plastic bags and with signs of torture in Rancho Las Pilas. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.

On 11 September 2024, in Obispo, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between rival armed groups. This event was replicated in other locations in the municipality (coded separately). The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September. Casualties unknown.
On 13 September 2024, in Cuautlacingo, Puebla, according to relatives, a woman was kidnapped by armed men in a parking lot in Colonia Del Perdon. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.
On 14 September 2024, in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan, armed men in a vehicle shot and killed a man (drive-by) in a gas station. Another man was also injured. 1 fatality.

Around 15 September 2024 (as reported), in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan, a man was killed and the body was found with signs of violence and wrapped in a blanket in Colonia Adolfo Lopez Mateo. 1 fatality.

On 24 September 2024, in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan de Ocampo, armed individuals opened fire at municipal police officers who repelled the aggression close to Colonia Mirador del Valle. There were no injuries.

On 26 September 2024, in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, at least two armed men shot and killed a man in Colonia Colinas de San Mateo. Several people arrived later and drove motorbikes around the body. 1 fatality.
On 1 October 2024, in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, armed individuals attacked and killed a man outside a mechanic's shop and fled the scene on two motorcycles. 1 fatality.

Around 9 October 2024 (as reported), in Ciudad Lopez Mateos, Mexico, a woman was abducted by an unknown number of people. The woman was rescued on 9 October 2024 by municipal police and navy officers from a commercial establishment in Colonia Lomas de Atizapan, where she was tied and gagged. It is suspected that the perpetrators demanded a ransom.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 11 October 2024 (as reported), around Veracruz, Veracruz, at least two people were killed and the human remains were found inside bags with messages by a criminal group around the Colinas de Santa Fe area on the Veracruz-Cardel highway. 2 fatalities.

On 13 October 2024, in Apatzingan de la Constitucion, Michoacan de Ocampo, several armed men arrived at a property and shot a man. The man was transported to the hospital where he died on the way. The victim was identified as operating a rehabilitation center for addiction. 1 fatality.

source: El Blog del Narco; El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova; La Verdad; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: On 21 October 2024, in Alcoyonqui, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between at least 30 armed individuals and the military forces. During the armed clash, a gang leader from the Sinaloa Cartel, belonging to Los Mayitos gang, and 20 other gang members were arrested. An alternative version indicates that rival armed groups had clashed before the army officers arrived at the scene and that, once they arrived, the military agreed not to arrest the cartel's leader in exchange for a million dollars. The officers would have subsequently broken the agreement, stolen the money, and clashed with the members of the cartel. This version is supported by a message on a blanket that was hung in Culiacan Rosales on 24 October 2024. In the message, Los Chapitos Gang claims to have an alliance with the military against Los Mayitos. This event is related to a similar clash reported in Carboneras community in the same municipality (coded separately). During both clashes, a total of 19 people were killed.19 fatalities split across two clashes, 10 fatalities coded in this event.

Around 25 October 2024 (as reported), in Naucalpan de Juarez, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found wit gunshot wounds and a message next to his body in Colonia San Jose de los Leones. 1 fatality.

On 12 October 2024, in Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, officer of the National Guard shot at a vehicle in Colonia Palmares. A little girl was injured and died later at the hospital. It is unknown the reason of the shooting or attack. When the incident occurred, relatives of the victims arrived to the location of the event, police officers threw tear gas at them. 1 fatality.

On 28 July 2024, in Tapachula de Cordova y Ordonez, Chiapas, armed individuals entered a house in Colonia Reforma and shot at migrants from Honduras. One woman was killed. Another six people were also injured including minors. 1 fatality.

The armed men left a grenade, which was later removed by the security forces, who also evacuated the residents of the building. There were no injuries.
On 19 August 2024, in Tapachula de Cordova y Ordonez, Chiapas, armed individuals opened fire from a moving vehicle (drive-by) and shot a woman. The woman died as a result. 1 fatality.

notes: On 8 September 2024, in Tapachula de Cordova y Ordonez, Chiapas, five armed men driving motorbikes entered 'La Cabana' party hall on Rio Nilo avenue in Fraccionamiento Las Vegas and shot at people, killing two men and injuring two. On 15 September 2024, in Tapachula de Cordova y Ordonez, Chiapas, two armed men on a motorcycle shot and killed a man outside a store in Colonia Laureles. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2024 (between 26 - 27 September), in San Miguel Xoxtla, Puebla, a man was killed and his body was found with a message nailed to the chest on km. 107 of Mexico-Puebla highway, direction Ciudad de Mexico on 27 September. The message suspectedly linking the attack with a case of extorsion and/or a settling of scores between the victim and a criminal group. 1 fatality.

Around 14 October 2024 (as reported), near Huejotzingo, Puebla, four men were killed and their bodies were found inside bags in a burning vehicle on Mexico-Puebla highway. All four men had criminal records for robbery. 4 fatalities.

Around 15 August 2024 (month of), in Playa del Carmen, Quintana Roo, five members of an unspecified gang shot and killed a man in Las Miches bar. The perpetrators were later arrested during a clash with police officers not related to this event on 4 April 2025. 1 fatality.

Around 24 October 2024 (as reported), in Nacajuca, Tabasco, man was killed and his body was found wrapped in plastic bags on the Villahermosa-Nacajuca highway. A message was found next to the body. 1 fatality.

The perpetrators took the woman to a building in the town of Jesus del Monte, where they shot and killed her. The girl was released on an unspecified date. A man and a woman were arrested around 17 April 2025. 1 fatality.

notes: On 11 September 2024, in Quila, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between dozens of armed men from criminal groups. The event was recorded in video and shared on social media. Another (narco) roadblock was also replicated in Culiacan city and Elota municipality (coded separately). According to local sources, these armed clashes come amid a possible war between the 'Chapitos' and 'Mayos' factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. At least two armed men from Los Chapitos and Los Mayos were killed. 2 fatalities.

Minutes before the dead body was found, armed individuals arrived to San Rafael in at least three vans and abducted two people (coded separately). 1 fatality.

This event is related to similar clashes involving factions of the Sinaloa Cartel recorded in other locations of this state (coded separately). There were no casualties.

On 25 October 2024, in Silao de la Victoria, Guanajuato, a woman and two men abducted a person in the intersection of 16 de Septiembre and Vicente Guerrero streets. The woman was arrested. The victim's whereabouts are unknown.

notes: Around 17 August 2024 (between 14 - 20 August), in Alamo, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, unknown armed individuals intercepted a member of the PVEM and former candidate and kidnapped him together with a woman on 14 August. He was killed and his body was found on 20 August in Jalpan, Puebla. 1 fatality.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: Around 20 September 2024 (as reported), in General Miguel Aleman, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture, with his hands and feet tied and several gunshot wounds in a sugarcane field. 1 fatality.

On 22 September 2024, in Penjamo, Guanajuato, the former councilman of Penjamo was shot and killed by unidentified armed individuals in a vehicle in a drive-by while traveling in Colonia Torres Cuatas. The politician was also a cattle rancher and owner of butcher shops. 1 fatality.

source: 24 Horas (Mexico); AFN - Tijuana; Diario de Morelos; El Blog del Narco; El Norte; El Proceso; El Universal (Mexico); La Jornada; La Silla Rota; La Verdad; La Voz de Michoacan; Milenio; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 17 October 2024, in Ciudad de Mexico - Cuauhtemoc, two armed individuals on a motorbike shot and killed a woman lawyer who was driving a van on Viaducto Miguel Aleman, near Parque Delta shopping mall and the intersection with Cuauhtemoc avenue, in Colonia Roma (drive-by). A version indicates that the perpetrators were following the victim since she left a bank. Police officers later found the motorbike used by the perpetrators in Colonia Obrera. The victim had previously been threatened by an officer of the Mexico City Attorney General's Office due to personal disputes. The suspected accomplices of the perpetrators, a man and two women, were arrested in Colonia Doctores, Cuauhtemoc, on 25 October 2024. One of the perpetrators was arrested in Colonia Obrera, Cuauhtemoc, on 13 December 2024. Another perpetrator (a man) and a woman who suspectedly planned the attack were arrested on 13 May 2025. 1 fatality.
Around 8 August 2024 (as reported), in Ensenada, Baja California, a person was killed and the body was found burned inside the trunk of a car that was set on fire in Colonia Las Lomas. 1 fatality.

On 10 August 2024, in Ensenada, Baja California, according to witnesses, an armed man on a motorcycle shot and killed two men and a woman in a drive-by in colonia El Roble. Another person was also injured. 3 fatalities, 1 injured.

Around 27 August 2024 (as reported), in Ensenada, Baja California, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied and with signs of violence inside a house in Colonia Popular 89. 1 fatality.

On 20 September 2024, in Las Bateas, Michoacan de Ocampo, Los Caballeros Templarios gang and the CJNG from Jalisco and Michoacan de Ocampo engaged in armed clashes in several municipalities of Apatzingan. No casualties.

Around 18 October 2024 (as reported), in San Pedro, Sinaloa, two people were killed and their bodies were found with signs of torture and wrapped in plastic on the path that connects Las Cribas and the landfill, 300 meters north of the Obelisk to the Battle of San Pedro. 2 fatalities.

source: AP; El Norte; Infobae; La Verdad; Tabasco Hoy; Univision
notes: On 18 October 2024, in Altar, Sonora, according to witnesses, armed individuals on a vehicle shot at a vehicle on Caborca-Altar road, killing an American man (drive-by). The victim was an off-duty American Marine. Two other women who were in the vehicle were not injured. One of the perpetrators, a suspected member of Los Deltas armed cell of Los Mayitos Gang, was arrested in Altar on 30 October 2024. Another perpetrator was killed during an armed clash with security forces in Altar around 30 October 2024 (coded separately). A third perpetrator was arrested in Altar on 13 February 2025. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2024, in San Pedro, Sinaloa, armed men opened fire at municipal security and traffic police officers on patrol, leading to the death of two officers while two other officers were injured. 2 fatalities, 2 injuries.

source: AFP; AP; Borderland Beat; Diario de Morelos; El Siglo de Durango; Imagen del Golfo; La Jornada; La Verdad; MiMorelia; Quadratin Oaxaca; SDP Noticias; Tabasco Hoy; Zeta Tijuana; Zona Franca
notes: On 20 October 2024, in San Cristobal de las Casas, Chiapas, according to witnesses, between two and four masked armed individuals on motorbikes shot and killed a man inside a van in the intersection of Las Peras and Franz Bloom streets, in the neighborhood of Cuxtitali (drive-by). The victim was a Tzotzil Indigenous (Mayan Indigenous group) catholic priest and human rights activist who had just officiated a mass at the church of Cuxtitali and was heading to the church of Guadalupe. The victim was known for denouncing the presence of criminal groups in Chiapas and participating in negotiations to solve conflicts between Indigenous communities and criminal groups. In 2021, the victim supported and mediated with the government for the formation of El Machete Policia Comunitaria in Pantelho. The same year, he was accused of being linked to the abduction of 21 men in Pantelho. According to some versions, the victim had been previously threatened by politicians connected to organized crime in the municipality of Simojovel, where the victim practiced as a priest. Additional versions indicate that the perpetrators of this attack could be members of Los Motonetos Gang or Los Herreras Gang. 1 fatality.

On 26 October 2024, in San Pedro, Sinaloa, unknown armed individuals attacked municipal police officers killing two police officers and injuring two while they were on surveillance. 2 fatalities, 2 injuries.

On 16 October 2024, close to San Juan Atzingo, Mexico, armed men aboard a vehicle opened fire and shot at two men accused of illegal logging on the way to Lagunas de Zempuala (drive-by). 2 fatalities.

admin1: Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave
notes: On 1 August 2024, in Orizaba, Veracruz de Ignacio de la Llave, at least three armed individuals attacked, disarmed, and beat two municipal officers during an operation to dismantle a safe house in Colonia Rafael Alvarado Fernandez. Later, state and police officers were able to enter the house and managed to dismantle the house and arrest three individuals.

A man linked to drug trafficking was arrested for participating in the abduction on 29 May 2025.

notes: Around 5 August 2024 (as reported), in Heroica Zitacuaro, Michoacan de Ocampo, members of the CJNG shot and killed six men and left their bodies dismembered inside plastic bags in Colonia Pueblo Nuevo and later in Colonia La Fundicion. A video with an interrogation made by eight members of the CJNG to the victims was recorded and shared on social media. The video shows how the victims confess to carrying out 'robberies' under the suspected protection of a suspected commander of the Michoacan Public Security Secretariat (SSP). 6 fatalities.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Jornada
notes: On 11 September 2024, in Eldorado, Sinaloa, military officers clashed with members of a criminal group during a patrol after recent clashes in the state. Four people were arrested among this clash and another one in San Ignacio (coded separately). According to the authorities, these events come amid a possible war between the 'Chapitos' and 'Mayos' factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. Casualties unknown.

On 10 October 2024, in Eldorado, Sinaloa, a 70-year-old man was killed after a grenade exploded on the Las Arenitas highway. The victim moved some sacks that blocked the passage along the aforementioned highway and underneath one of these there was a grenade placed that was activated with the movement. 1 fatality.

On 15 October 2024, in Ayutla de los Libres, Guerrero, an armed clash was reported between members of the UPOEG and another group, which is linked to the presence of a new group in the region. At least three people were killed, including the leader of the UPOEG. 3 fatalities.
Around 15 October 2024 (as reported), in Ayutla de los Libres, Guerrero, one person was killed and the human remains were found inside a plastic bag. 1 fatality.

On 23 October 2024, in Eldorado, Sinaloa, armed individuals engaged in an armed clash on the Culiacan-Eldorado highway close to Mezquitillo and the road was blocked with trucks that were later removed. One house and three vehicles were damaged. There were no casualties.

Around 19 October 2024 (as reported), in Apaxco de Ocampo, Mexico, a man was killed and his body was found with gunshot wounds and a threatening message in a field in Colonia Perez de Galeana. 1 fatality.

Around 17 October 2024 (between 17 - 18 October), in La Carroza, Nuevo Leon, a man was killed and his body was found partially burned on 18 October 2024. At least three individuals had abducted the victim from his house in San Jose de la Popa on 17 October 2024. The perpetrators also burned his house. 1 fatality.

Around 9 August 2024 (as reported), in Tlapa de Comonfort, Guerrero, a group of armed men held a man who was accused of stealing. The man was beaten, tied up, stripped naked and forced to walk around with a piece of cardboard apologizing for stealing. According to the authorities, the event was made by a criminal group that operates in the area. The event was recorded in video and shared on social media.
On 18 August 2024, in Cruz Grande, Guerrero, unknown armed individuals shot and killed the former PRD councilor of Copala and lawyer and current advisor to the elected alternate mayor. 1 fatality.

Around 30 August 2024 (as reported), in Igualapa municipality, Guerrero, at least four men kidnapped and killed two merchants from Puebla. The victims' bodies were found near the rio Igualpa. Authorities arrested one suspect who said that the victims were killed after not paying the ransom requested for their release. 2 fatalities.

On 11 September 2024, in Pueblo Nuevo de Canachi, Sinaloa, there was an armed clash between rival armed groups. This event was replicated in other locations in the municipality (coded separately). The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September. Casualties unknown.
Around 21 September 2024 (as reported), in Villanueva, Zacatecas, two people were killed and their bodies were found dismembered inside plastic bags. 2 fatalities.
Around 22 September 2024 (as reported), in Villanueva, Zacatecas, a man was killed and his body was found in Colonia Flores del Pedregal in a vacant lot covered in a sheet. 1 fatality.

Around 23 September 2024 (month of), near Higueras de Abuya, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with his hands tied to his back on the Culiacan-Mazatlan highway. The body was in a state of decomposition. 1 fatality.

Around 27 September 2024 (as reported), in Higueras de Abuya, Sinaloa, armed groups clashed. The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). Casualties unknown.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Cerro Gordo, Guanajuato, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found dismembered accompanied by two messages on banners at the central plaza. This attack is likely related to a series of attack perpetrated by the Santa Rosa de Lima Cartel. 2 fatalities.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Valtierrilla, Guanajuato, a man and a woman were killed and their bodies were found at the entrance to the community tied and with messages next to their bodies. This attack is likely related to a series of attack perpetrated by the Santa Rosa de Lima Cartel. 2 fatalities.

On 2 October 2024, in Apetatitlan, Tlaxcala, two armed individuals shot at a businessman of the oil industry in Colonia Tecolotla. The businessman died as a result and his driver was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

Around 3 October 2024 (as reported), in Higueras de Abuya, Sinaloa, a man was killed and his body was found with signs of torture and tied with a rope around his neck close to El Ejido Abuya Ceuta 2. The man's hands were tied to his back and he was naked from his torso up. 1 fatality.

source: El Siglo de Durango; El Sol de Sinaloa; Noroeste; Riodoce; Tabasco Hoy
notes: On 28 September 2024, in Higueras de Abuya, Sinaloa, rival armed groups clashed on the highway known as 'Maxipista Culiacan-Mazatla'. Several other related clashes were recorded on the same day in other communities along this road (coded separately). This event is likely related to the ongoing fight between factions of the Sinaloa Cartel that started on 9 September (coded separately). There were no casualties.

source: El Sol de Sinaloa; La Prensa de Monclova; Milenio; Riodoce
notes: On 20 October 2024, in Higueras de Abuya, Sinaloa, army officers and armed individuals clashed. An officer died and several were injured. This event is suspectedly linked to an armed clash that took place in Los Tanques the same day (coded separately), and is likely part of the war between 'Los Chapitos' and 'Los Mayitos' factions of the Sinaloa Cartel. 1 fatality.

On 25 October 2024, near Santo Tomas Chautla, Puebla, armed individuals in two vehicles shot and injured a woman traveling in her truck to Valsequillo (drive-by). The perpetrators fled the scene. 1 injury.

On 24 October 2024, in Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, two armed individuals traveling on a motorcycle attacked two men at the Monterrey park in the north of the city in Colonia Fomerrey 15. One man died and another was injured. 1 fatality, 1 injury.

The event is likely related to the ongoing fight between the Sinaloa Cartel factions of Los Mayitos and Los Chapitos gangs in the municipality of Culiacan that started on 9 September (coded separately). 1 fatality.

This event is part of three clashes between authorities and the CDN that took place in Nuevo Leon the same day (coded separately). Casualties unknown.
